pe8:1.1: Yani cattari jhanani, tesam jhananam imani angani, tesam anganam samuho assa anga, ayam jhanabhumi ko visesoti assa viseso.
pe8:1.2: Ime sambhara tehi ayam samudagamo, tassa samudagamassa ayam upanisa, taya upanisaya ayam bhavana.
pe8:1.6: Tam yatha bhanitam paccavekkhanto ayam viseso.
pe8:1.7: Tena visesena ayam assado, so kassa assado ajhaniya jhayino, tassa ajhaniya jhayino, idam kallita kosalle thitajjhanam anomaddiyatam gacchati jhanabalam, jhanabale thitassa ayam paramippattassa imani jhanangani anavilasankappo pathame jhane jhanangani bhavi.
pe8:1.8: So piti tadanusarittava pathame jhane jhanangam tassanguno ca dhamma tadabhisannitaya ca.
pe8:1.9: Piti dutiye jhane jhanangadhammata kho pana tatha pavattassa sahagatam jhanangadhammam sasukhataya ajjhattam sampasado dutiye jhane jhanangam manosampasadanataya tadabhisannitaya ca.
pe8:1.10: Piti dutiye jhane jhanangam ajjhattam sampasadanam samadhita piti dutiye jhane jhanangam, cetaso ekodibhavo dutiye jhane jhanangam, upekkha phassata tatiye jhane jhanangam, sukham tassa anganti ca.
pe8:1.11: Cetaso ekodibhavo catutthe jhane jhanangam, upekkha adukkhamasukha catutthe jhane jhanangam, abhinisabhumi upekkhasatiparisuddhi catutthe jhane jhanangam.
pe8:1.12: Satiparisuddhi ca anekajjhanabhumisu jhanangasamayutta piti cetaso ekodibhavo catutthe jhane jhanangam.
pe8:2.2: Savitakke savicare viveka anugata pathame jhane jhanabhumi.
pe8:2.3: Avitakke avicare ajjhattam sampasadanam janitam pitimanugata dutiye jhane jhanabhumi.
pe8:2.5: Tassa sukhadukkhasahagata abhiniharasahagata catutthe jhane jhanabhumi.
pe8:2.9: Anupassanasahagata kayasankhara samma catutthassa jhanassa bhumi.
pe8:3.2: Vivicceva kamehi vivicca papakehi akusalehi dhammehi cittacetasikasahagata kamadhatusamatikkamanatapi, ayam jhanaviseso.
pe8:3.3: Avitakka ceva avicara ca sappitikaya satisahagataya pitisahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti.
pe8:3.5: Avitakkaya bhumiya avicareyeva sati anugata upekkhasahagata manasikara samudacaranti.
pe8:3.7: Tanca bhumim upasampajja viharati, ayam jhanaviseso.
pe8:3.8: Satiparisuddhisahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, tanca bhumim upasampajja viharati, ayam jhanaviseso.
pe8:3.9: Vinnanancayatanasahagataya bhumiyam akincannayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, tanca bhumim upasampajja viharati, ayam jhanaviseso.
pe8:4.4: Indriyesu guttadvarata appicchata sambharo parisuddhajivo catunnam samapattinam sambharo akammassa viharita.
pe8:4.7: Kusalahetu yam jhanam samudayam gacchanti ko ca na kutoci nekkhammappatta samudagacchanti.
pe8:4.10: Sukhindriyam somanassindriyam pahanaya te ca abyapajjataya samudagacchanti.
pe8:6.5: Upekkhabhavana passavata upekkhabhavana apassavata upekkha ca ajjhupekkha ca, asubhasannabhavana dukkhapatipada dandhabhinna bhavasandhabhinna bhavasandhanam, sa chabbidha bhavana bhavita bahulikata anutthita vatthukata yanikata paricita susamaraddha.
pe8:7.2: Pathame jhane sankharasamannagato eso dhammo assuto sasavo.
pe8:7.3: Sace esa dhammo ayam silo asannapatipakkho ca esa dhammo kamo paticaro pativicaro samapattinam ca sabbolariko esa dhammo vitakkavicaro ca.
pe8:7.4: Tattha cittam khobhenti, kayo cettha kilamati, kayamhi cettha kilante cittam vihannati.
pe8:7.5: Anabhiniharakkhamova abhinnanam ime adinava pathame jhane.
pe8:8.1: Dutiye jhane ime adinava pitipharanasahagato ca eso dhammo, na samudacarasseti cittam.
pe8:8.2: Asodhayam upagamo cesa dhammo upagamiparissayo domanassapaccatthiko cesa dhammo.
pe8:8.3: Tattha tattha yuttinam piti parajjato cesa dhammo dukkaram hoti, avattasantasabhumiparivajjayanto catusu dukkhatasu esa dhammo anuviddhapanasaddhaya dukkhataya ca na palibodhadukkhataya ca abhinnadukkhataya ca rogadukkhataya ca, ime adinava dutiye jhane.
pe8:9.2: Upekkhasukhasahagataya tattha satavinam pancannam upekkhasukham parivattito esa dhammo tena niccasannitananca yam hoti.
pe8:9.3: Dukkhopaniyam sukham cittassa sankhobhatam upadaya sukhadukkhaya gato savati.
pe8:9.5: Abhinnaya sacchikiriyasu sabbepi cete dhamma tisu jhanasamapattisu catuhi ca dukkhatahi anuviddhanam sa bhaya dukkhataya palibodhadukkhataya ca abhinnaya dukkhataya ca ime adinava tatiye jhane.
pe8:10.2: Akincannasamapattika te dhammanusamapattika etissa ca bhumiyam satanam balaputhujjananam anekavidhani ditthigatani uppajjanti.
pe8:10.3: Olarika sukhumehi ca rupasannahi anuvidhani etani jhanani sada anudayamettajhanakalanudanukalaya sadharana, dukkara ca sabbe cattaro mahasambhara samudagatani ca etani jhanani annamannam nissaya samudagacchanti.
pe8:10.4: Ettha samudagata ca ete dhamma na samatta honti.
pe8:10.6: Nirujjhanti ca ete dhamma na upadiyanti nirujjhangani ca, etesam dhammanam jhanani nimittani na jhananimittasanna vokirati.
pe8:11.1: Nirodhasamapattiya apatisankhaya avasesasannino akincannayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, so nirodhasamapattito parihayati.
pe8:11.2: Anenjasannino asannayatanam samapannassa akincannayatanasahagata manasikara samudacaranti, tanca bhumim na pajanati, so tato parihayati.
pe8:11.3: Akincannayatanam samapannassa vinnanancayatanasanna manasikara samudacaranti, tanca bhumim na pajanati, so tato parihayati.
pe8:11.7: Sakassa parihayati, kalankajjhane kalankam jhayati, parisamantato jhayati, bhindanto jhayati, na sajjhayati, ayuhanto jhayati, kinci ca niparicito jhayati.
pe8:11.8: Atividhavanto jhayati, atimannanto jhayati, kayasankhare appatisambhare jhayati, pariyutthanassa nissaranam ajananto jhayati, nivaranabhibhuto jhayati, assapattimanasikaronto jhanassa assado kamaragapariyutthanam pahanam jhanassa assado kamaragahetunam dhammanam udayanti, nirujjhangani etesam dhammanam jhanani uparima sukhupekkha kamakammakilesanam pahanam assado, evam kho puna jhanassa assado mahasamvasamappilite lokasannivase asambodhokasa vigamessamidam jhanappahana.
pe8:11.9: Ayam palirodhamappalirodhalokasannivase esanidhamidam jhanam anamataggasamsarasamapannanam sattanam samsarappahanana anisamso, yamidam jhanassa assado kayassa ajhaniyajhayino bhavati.
pe8:11.10: Ajhaniyajhaniyajhayihi aparamasanto ajhaniyajhayitam jhayati, yani kalankajjhayino padani, tani anudhitani patipakkhe.
pe8:12.2: Samapattikosallam jhanakosallam, jhanavisesakosallam jhanakosallam, jhanantarikakosallam jhanakosallam, samapattivutthanakosallam jhanakosallam, jhane sabhavakosallam jhanakosallam, jhane adinavakosallam jhanakosallam, jhane nissaranakosallam jhanakosallam, jhanaphalena upadaya kosallam, jhanaphalena patisankhanaphale aparihanadhammata nibbattijhane ca kilitapi visesabhagiyam jhanam patilabbhati.
pe8:12.3: Idam panassati bhavaharita ca arammananimittaggaho anabhiniharabalam, cittekaggata nimittasu gatisahita samathabalena asamsidananca jhane maggaphalam samatham pavatte samadhino upekkhapalipubbaparanimittasayo paggahino satibalam tam pavattitananca vipassananam samannabale.
pe8:13.1: Suparamita metta kamesu satta kamasangasattati yamhi sutte desanaya voharena dve saccani nidditthani, dukkhanca samudayo ca, vicayena harena ye samyojaniyesu dhammesu vajjam na passanti, te ogham tarissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe8:13.2: Na tarissantiti atthi esa yutti ca vicayo ca idam nu kissa padatthanam, kamesu sattati panca kamaguna, tam kamatanhaya padatthanam.
pe8:13.3: Samyojane vajjamapassamanati avijjaya padatthanam, na hi jatu samyojanasangasatta ogham tareyyum vipulam mahantanti upadanassa padatthanam.
pe8:13.5: vatthukama ca kilesakama ca, tattha kilesakama kamatanha kamatanhaya yutta bhavanti rupatanha bhavatanha lakkhanena harena, samyojane vajjamapassamanati samyojanassa.
pe8:13.6: Yo tattha chandarago tassa kim padatthanam?
pe8:13.9: Iti sukhaya vedanaya gahitaya tayopi vedana gahita honti.
pe8:13.10: Vedanakkhandhe gahite sabbe pancakkhandha gahita honti.
pe8:13.11: Rupasaddagandharasaphotthabba gahita, vatthukamesu gahitesu sabbani cha bahirani ayatanani gahitani honti.
pe8:13.12: Ajjhattikabahiresu ayatanesu yo sato, ayam vuccate lakkhano haro, tattha yo olarikamhi kilese ajjhavasito sabbakilesesu yo na tato sukhumataresu na vitarago bhavati.
pe8:13.15: Ye ogham taritukama te samyojaniyesu dhammesu adinavanupassino viharissantiti ayamettha bhagavato adhippayo.
pe8:13.16: Kamesu sattati yesu ca satta yena ca satta yesanca satta ayam catubbidho akaro sabbesam harabhagiyo.
pe8:14.1: Tattha katamani tini vipallasani padatthanani ca?
pe8:14.2: Cittavipallasassa ditthivipallasassa sannavipallasassa tayo vipallasa tini akusalamulani padatthanam.
pe8:14.6: Yatha matuya va pituno va annatarassa va puna ularassa bhikkhuno abhayam deti.
pe8:14.7: Tattha anno miccha patipajjeyya kayena va vacaya va.
pe8:14.8: Tattha so byapadamupadaya tesam ularanam rakkhavaranaguttiya anupalayanto yo ularanam abhayam deti.
pe8:14.9: Tesam abhaye dinne yo tattha miccha patipajjeyya.
pe8:14.10: Tattha so byapadam upadayanto dosajam kammam karoti.
pe8:14.11: Yo tattha asadhu indriya nivaranam yam tesam abhayam dakkhinato sannam idam panitam karanam maya puna tattha micchapatipatti ayam byapado hinagamivakammam lobho moho ca imani nivaranani vacanani tani cattari upadanani tehi catuhi upadanehi yo so upadano itthi va puriso va tesam pancakkhandhanam teyeva upadano samudayo idam dukkhanca samudayo ca soyeva desanaharo.
pe8:15.1: Tattha kamesu ye na pajjanti, te adinavanupassanaya pajjanti.
pe8:15.2: Itissa kamadhatuya nikkhamitukamata, ayam vuccati nekkhammacchando.
pe8:15.3: Yo tattha anabhisankharanam kinci visodheti tassa dhavara va, ayam abyapadacchando.
pe8:15.10: Imani tini kusalamulani atthasu sampattesu parahitani, tesamyeva catunnam upadananam nirodhaya samvattanti.
pe8:15.11: Sace va puna kammam kareyya kanham va sukkam va tassa vipakahanaya samvattanti.
pe8:15.12: Idam kammam akanham asukkam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
pe8:15.13: Tattha yo tinnam akusalamulanam nirodho, ayam nirodho.
pe8:15.14: Soyeva maggo tattha patipadani imani dve saccani imani cattari saccani avatto haro.
pe8:16.1: Kamesu sattati ye sekkha, te ekenevakarena satta.
pe8:16.2: Ye puthujjana, te dvihakarehi satta, tassayam panho vibhajjabyakaraniyo vattabbo.
pe8:16.3: Kincapi sotapanno patisevanaya, no ca kho abhinivese satto yo hi apacayaya padahati, na upacayaya.
pe8:16.6: Tattha kamesu sattanam catuogham tarissatiti vibhajjabyakaraniyo, ayam vibhatti.
pe8:17.1: Parivattanoti kame ye neva sajjanti na ca samyojanehi samyutta, te ogham tarissanti vipulam mahantanti.
pe8:18.1: Vevacananti yo kamesu satto yo ca tattha kamanam guno, tattha viso satto.
pe8:18.2: Yepi kamanam ahara dhamma, tattha viso satto.
pe8:18.3: Tatthimam kamanam vevacanam pako rajo sallam gando iti upaddavoti.
pe8:18.4: Yani va pana annani vevacanani tattha viso sattoti vevacanam.
pe8:18.5: Satto bandho mucchito gadhito ajjhosito kame ajjhapanna parimutto tabbahulavihariti.
pe8:18.6: Yani va pana annani vevacanani, ayam vevacano nama.
pe8:18.8: Satto tabbahulavihariti yani va pana annani.
pe8:18.9: Ime kamappacarapannattiya kilesagocarapannattiya pannatta, bijapannattiya pannatta, sankhara samyojanapannattiya pannatta, upadanam hetupannattiya pannattam, puggalo puthupannattiya pannatto.
pe8:19.1: Otaranoti imaya paticcasamuppado dukkhanca samudayo ca.
pe8:19.2: Ye kilesa ye sankhara samyojanani ca pancasu khandhesu sankharakkhandho dhammayatanesu akusala dhammayatanani indriyesu sukhindriyanca, somanassindriyanca, ayam indriyotarano.
pe8:21.1: Adhitthanoti ime dhamma atthi ekattataya pannatta atthi vemattataya.
pe8:21.2: Ye sanna bahiro kame, te vemattataya pannatta.
pe8:21.3: Pancasu kamagunesu sattati pariyutthanavipallasa vemattataya pannatta ogham tareyyum.
pe8:22.1: Parikkharoti tassa ko hetu ko paccayo?
pe8:22.3: Ayoniso ca manasikaro sannissayassa paccayataya paccayo.
pe8:23.1: Samaropano paccayoti ye kamesu satta sugata surupati ayam kamadhatuya chando rago te apunnamaya sankhara.
pe8:23.7: Sankharapaccaya vinnanam yava jaramaranam evametassa kevalassa mahato dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti ekam suttam gatam.
pe8:24.2: Ya ca abhijjha yo ca byapado yanca uddhaccam, ayam tanha.
pe8:24.3: Yanca thinamiddham, yanca kukkuccam ya ca vicikiccha, ayam ditthi.
pe8:24.4: Ya pana kayassa akammaniyata kincapi tam middham no tu sabhavakilesataya kileso, iti ya ca cittasalliyana ya ca kayakammaniyata, ayam pakkhopakileso na tu sabhavakileso.
pe8:24.5: Tattha attasannanupacittam kilamatho kukkuccanupacittam thinam ya cittassa liyana, iti ime panca nivarana cattari nivaranani sabhavakilesa thinamiddham nivaranapakkhopakileso.
pe8:24.6: Yatha cattaro asava sabhavaasavataya asava no tu cittasasavataya asava.
pe8:24.9: Atha panaha suttantam yena te sampayutta va vippayutta va asava, teyeva ete vattabba sasava va anasava va.
pe8:25.3: Yam va pana kinci ajjhosanagatam sasava abhijjhitassa mettanupassiya yo anattham carati.
pe8:25.4: Tattha yo byapadam uppadeti, acari carissatiti.
pe8:25.5: Evam nava aghatavatthuni kattabbani, tassevam byapadanupassissa kileso yo paridaho kayakilamatho akammaniyata middham.
pe8:25.9: Yam yatha idam santiranam, ayam vicikiccha.
pe8:25.10: Tattha avijja ca tanha ca atthi, idam pariyutthanam.
pe8:25.11: Avaranam nivaranam chadanam upakkileso ca atthi, idam kamacchando kamaragapariyutthanassa padatthanam.
pe8:26.2: Kamaragapariyutthane vutte sabbani pariyutthanani vuttani hontiti.
pe8:27.2: Ye ime panca nivarana jhanapatipakkho so dukkhasamudayo.
pe8:28.4: Yadapi bahiddha sarajjati, tadapi nivaranam, evam yava vicikiccha ime dasa nivarana.
pe8:28.5: Ajjhattabahiddha kilesa imani dve samyojanani ajjhattasamyojananca bahiddhasamyojananca.
pe8:28.8: Yo ajjhattam chandarago rupesu avitarago bhavati avitacchando.
pe8:28.9: Evam yava vinnane, ayam ajjhatta tanha.
pe8:28.10: Yam chasu bahiresu ayatanesu tisu ca bhavesu ajjhosanam, ayam bahiddha tanha.
pe8:28.11: Imani dve saccani samyojanani samyojaniya ca dhamma.
pe8:28.12: Tattha samyojanesu dhammesu ya nibbidanupassana ca, ayam maggo.
pe8:29.3: Manasamyojanam ditthibhagiyanti na tam ekamsena aditthamanam nissayamanam na pajahati.
pe8:29.4: Yo panca uddhambhagiyo mano kincapi so ditthipakkhe siya.
pe8:29.5: Na tu orambhagiyam samyojanam tassa pahanaya samvattatiti.
pe8:29.6: Yo ca ahankaro na paviddhoyam panassa evam hoti.
pe8:29.7: Kadasu namaham tam santam ayatanam sacchikatva upasampajja viharissami, yam ariya santam ayatanam upasampajja viharissantiti, ayam abhijjha na ca tam nivaranam.
pe8:29.8: Atthi pana arahato kayakilesamiddhanca okkamati na ca tam nivaranam tassa thinamiddham nivarananti.
pe8:30.1: Parivattanoti panca nivarana pancangikena jhanena pahanam gacchanti.
pe8:30.2: Ayam tesam patipakkho nivarano asukassa pahinati na annanuminitabbam, paramatthamajjhattam, ayam parivattana.
pe8:32.1: Pannattiti avijjapaccaya kiccapannattiya pannatti, byapado vikkhepapannattiya pannatti, thinamiddham asamugghatapannattiya pannatti.
pe8:32.2: Evam sabbepi ete panca nivarana imamhi sutte vikkhepapannattiya pannatti.
pe8:33.2: Ime panca nivarana avijja ca tanha ca tattha avijjamula nivarana.
pe8:33.3: Ya tanha ime sankhara, te avijjapaccaya ime dve dhamma pancasu khandhesu sankharakkhandhapariyapanna, ayatanesu dhammayatanam, dhatusu dhammadhatu, indriyesu imesam dhammanam padatthanam sukhindriyassa ca somanassindriyassa ca itthindriyassa ca purisindriyassa ca.
pe8:34.2: Idam suttam yatha arabbha nikkhittam so attho bhasito imehi pancahi padehi.
pe8:35.1: Tattha kamacchando ca byapado ca vicikiccha ca na ekattataya pannatta, kamati na ekattataya pannatta, atha khalu vemattataya pannatta.
pe8:36.4: Byapadassa ayoniso manasikaro aghatavatthuni ca paccayo;
pe8:36.8: Uddhaccakukkuccassa rajaniyam arammaniyam assadiyakindriyam tava aparipunnanca nanam paccayo;
pe8:36.10: Vicikicchaya nava manavidha arammanam mananusayo, sova paccayo;
pe8:36.12: Ete panca dhamma sahetu sappaccaya uppajjanti.
pe8:37.2: Ime panca nivarana cattaropi ete asava gandapi ete sallapi ete upadanani ete.
pe8:37.3: Tesu eva bahiresu dhammesu sankilesabhagiyam suttanti pannattim gacchati.
pe8:39.2: Imamhi sutte ko attho khandhavavatthanena vinnanakkhandham deseti, dhatuvavatthanena manovinnanadhatum, ayatanavavatthanena manayatanam, indriyavavatthanena manindriyam.
pe8:39.4: Sankhittena cha dhamma pubbangama dhamma kusalamulani ca akusalamulani ca animittam imamhi sutte kusalamulam desitam.
pe8:39.6: Mano tesam pubbangamam, yathapi balassa raja pubbangamo, evameva dhammanam manopubbangama.
pe8:39.7: Tattha tividhanam pubbangamanam nekkhammacchandena abyapadacchandena avihimsachandena.
pe8:39.11: Tattha manosetthati manasa ime dhamma ussata manena va nimmita.
pe8:39.12: Manova imesam dhammanam setthoti manova imesam dhammanam setthajetthoti manova imesam dhammanam adhipaccam karotiti manosettha.
pe8:39.15: Yatha vato sigham gacchati anno va koci sigham gamako vuccate vatajavoti pakkhigamikoti, evameva ime dhamma manena sampajayamana gacchanti, tattha ime dhamma gacchantiti manojavati.
pe8:39.16: Te tividha chandasamudanita anavilata ca sankappo.
pe8:39.17: Sattavidha ca kayikam sucaritam vacasikam sucaritam, te dasa kusalakammapatha.
pe8:39.21: Imehi imasmim sutte dasa kusalakammapatha paramapi santa silavata parama.
pe8:39.22: So bhavati vivattiyam na lokaniyyanaya vasanabhagiyam suttam bhavati.
pe8:41.1: Yuttiti dasannam kusalakammapathanam yo vipako, so sukhavedaniyo abyapadassangamano.
pe8:42.2: Manopubbangama dhammati sabbakusalapakkhassa ime dhamma padatthanam.
pe8:42.3: Manasa ce pasannenati yo cetaso pasado, idam saddhindriyassa padatthanam.
pe8:42.5: Karoti vati sammakammantassa ca sammavayamassa ca padatthanam.
pe8:43.1: Lakkhanoti iti pubbangama dhammati vedanapubbangamapi ete, sannapubbangamapi ete, sankharapubbangamapi ete.
pe8:43.2: Ye keci dhamma sahajata sabbe pubbangama etesam dhammanam.
pe8:43.3: Tato nam sukhamanvetiti somanassamapi nam anveti yam susukhacchaya tadapi nam sukham tadapi anveti.
pe8:44.4: Sabbeyeva ime chavinnanakaya, imamhi bhagavato ko adhippayo?
pe8:44.5: Ye sukhena atthika, te manam pasadentiti ayam imamhi sutte bhagavato adhippayo.
pe8:45.1: Yani hi kusalamulani, tani atthanisamsamatta hetu, ayam atthangiko maggo.
pe8:45.2: Dasa thanani desanahetuni desanapaccaya niddesana ca.
pe8:45.3: Tattha yam manne dukkhena saha namarupam vinnanasaccanti angena kusalamulam pahiyati, ayam appahinabhumiyam samudayo.
pe8:48.1: Tam na ekamsena samanassa va brahmanassa va pana hoti.
pe8:48.2: Tassa va micchaditthikassa sakasatthe cittam pasadeti, tena ca pasannena cittena bhasati byakaroti na tam sukhamanveti na chayava anugamini, dukkhameva tam anveti.
pe8:48.3: Yatha vahantam cakkam padamanveti, idam tam vibhajjabyakaraniyam.
pe8:48.4: Manasa ce pasannena kayakammam vacikammam sukhavedaniyanti samaggate sukhavedaniyam micchaggate dukkhavedaniyam, ayam vibhatti.
pe8:49.2: Manopubbangama dhammati yam manasa padutthena bhasati va karoti va dukkhamassanugamini, etaniyeva dve suttani bhasitani esa eva ca patipakkho.
pe8:49.3: Vevacananti yadidam mano cittam vinnanam manindriyam manovinnanadhatu.
pe8:50.1: Pannattiti manopubbangama dhammati ayam mano kinci pannattiya pannattam.
pe8:50.8: Manasa ce pasannenati assaddhanam patipakkhapannattiya pannattam.
pe8:50.14: Manopubbangama dhammati metta ca muduta ca jhanesu dutiyam jhanam tatiyanca.
pe8:50.17: Yam kusalam indriyesu sukhindriyanca somanassindriyanca padatthanam.
pe8:50.18: Imesam dhammanam paticcasamuppannanam phassapaccaya sukhavedaniyo phasso sukhavedana manopavicaresu somanassavicaro chattimsesu pathamapadesu cha somanassanekkhammassita.
pe8:51.2: Yam attham arabbha idam suttam bhasitam.
pe8:51.3: So attho niyutto etamattham arabbha suttam.
pe8:52.4: Manasa ce pasannenati so pasado dvidho ajjhattanca abyapadavikkhambhanabahiddha ca okappanato.
pe8:52.9: Tato nam sukhamanvetiti sukham kayikanca cetasikanca appiyavippayogopi piyasampayogopi nekkhammasukhampi puthujjanasukhampi pitisambojjhangampi cetasikam sukham.
pe8:52.10: Yampi passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, tampi kayikam sukham bojjhanga ca cetasikam sukham.
pe8:52.11: Yampi passaddhakayo sukham vedesi, tampi tanca sukhapadatthanam pannattiya yathavuttam tam aparamattham kusalanam dhammanam.
pe8:52.12: Anvetiti appana sandissati na cayam va pattabhuto anveti.
pe8:52.14: Hetuna ca yo pasannamanaso vipakena ca yo dukkhavedaniyo.
pe8:53.1: Parikkharoti bhagava pancasatena bhikkhusanghena nagaram pavisati rajagaham.
pe8:53.2: Tattha manusso puggalo bhagavantam parivisati, tassa pasado uppanno kusalamulapubbayogavacaropi.
pe8:53.3: So annesanca akkhati, idam vacam bhasati labha tesam, yesam nivesanam bhagava pavisati, amhakampi yadi bhaveyya mayampi bhagavato sampasadam lacchamhati.
pe8:53.4: Yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva “namo bhagavato namo bhagavato”ti abyapadamano ekamante atthasi.
pe8:53.5: Tadanantare bhagava imam suttam abhasittha “manopubbangama dhamma”ti.
pe8:53.6: Sabbam suttam tatha yam paresam bhasati idam vacakammam.
pe8:53.9: Tattha yam paresam pakaseti bhasati vannam.
pe8:53.12: Yam bhagavati mettacitto, tassa adoso kusalamulam.
pe8:53.13: Yam anjalim panameti mananca nigganhati, tatthassa amoho kusalamulam patubhavati.
pe8:53.15: Yam tathayeva samvaro hoti, idamassa sannavipallasappahanam.
pe8:53.16: Yam manassa pasadanam, idamassa cittavipallasappahananti akusalavipallasanam vikkhambhanam pahanam paccayo.
pe8:53.17: Tini kusalamulani yo anavilacittasankappo, so tassa manasikaroti vuccati.
pe8:53.18: Yam kilesehi vikkhambhanam iti vipallasa ca arammana sappaccayataya paccayo kusalamulani ca sandissayataya paccayo, so ca manasikaro hetuna imina paccayena cittam uppannam.
pe8:53.19: Tattha yam sasattharammanam cittam pavattam ayam buddhanussati.
pe8:53.20: Yampi bhagavato gune manasi karoti, ayamassa dhammanussati.
pe8:53.23: Kayasankhara kammassa abhisankharo nama hetu va appaccayo sukhavedaniyassa kammassa upacayo hetuka kammassa paccayo.
pe8:54.2: Manasayeva pasannena satoyevettha pasanno api ca cittavodana satta vimuccantiti tena satta cittapubbangama cittena pasannena cetanapi tattha cittabhuta bhavantiti patigha ayam cetananam pasadena kayo cassa pasado, so ca arabhati pasadena pasanno sannananti cassa aviparita, so pancavidho vikkhambhana, kayapassambhanayeva pasado cittasito cittam pana pubbamyeva pasannam.
pe8:54.5: Tato nam sukhamanvetiti katamam bhagava niddisati?
pe8:54.6: Na hi attasaccam tassa kammassa vipako anveti.
pe8:54.7: Tassa upayo anugacchati yada sitapaccaya uppajjate somanassam avippatisaropi anveti.
pe8:55.2: Tasmince samaye assato asampajano kalam kareyya kame bhavati.
pe8:55.3: Assato abhisamaharo yo ma bhayi, mahanama, yam tam cittam digharattam saddhaparibhavitam silaparibhavitam sutacagaparibhavitanti vittharena katabbam.
pe8:55.4: Cagena ca pannaya ca kim dasseti?
pe8:55.10: Apare ahu gunaparisuddhinitthagamanalakkhana, yanca apare va vacanapatiggahalakkhana saddha.
pe8:55.11: Aparo pariyayo attanam yadi evam okappeti “naham kinci janamiti esa aham tattha anunnatta anannata”ti.
pe8:55.13: Aparo pariyayo ekasatthiya ditthigatanam adinavanupassana aniccam dukkhamanattati.
pe8:55.14: Tena ca padittham bhavati yatha gambhire udapane udakam cakkhuna passati na ca kayena abhisambhunati.
pe8:55.15: Evamassa ariya nijjhanakkhantiya ditthi bhavati, na ca sacchikata.
pe8:55.18: Aparo pariyayo khamati puthujjanabhutassa visati cati ko sakkayadhina na niveso.
pe8:55.19: Na etam ekanti nayasanna yathabhutam ditthiya tu khalu muduhi pancahi indriyehi dassanamaggena pahina bhavanti.
pe8:56.2: Tasmimyeva bhumiyam sekkhasilam ariya dharanti vuccati.
pe8:56.4: Tasmimyeva bhumiyam khandhehi anatthikata, ayam cago.
pe8:56.6: Yatikena bhiyyo manena sa hissa viparita ditthika assaddha, sa nayanaupadhisu pamatta samadinna.
pe8:56.7: Tattha saddhindriyam yo kamam parivissanti iti santapapapatinissagga na cagadhitthanam pannindriyena pannadhitthanam, silena upasamadhitthanam.
pe8:56.8: Ime cattaro dhamma silam paribhavayanti saddha silam cago ca pannati.
pe8:56.12: Ya panna, idam pannindriyam, tattha yam saddhindriyam.
pe8:56.16: Ya panna, sa saccesu, sati sabbatthagamini.
pe8:56.17: Tassa sekkhassa bhaddika bhati, bhaddiko abhisamparayo.
pe8:56.18: Tassa sammutthassatikassa silam karontassa na kayasammutthassatitaya tani va indriyani tam va kusalamulam kammavipakam bhavati.
pe8:56.20: Tattha saddha silam cago panna cattaro dhamma.
pe8:56.21: Ya saddha ya ca panna, idam manosucaritam.
pe8:56.22: Yam silam, idam kayikam vacasikam sucaritam.
pe8:56.23: Yo cago, idam cetasikam alobho sucaritam.
pe8:56.24: Iti citte gahite pancakkhandha gahita bhavanti.
pe8:56.25: Imehi dhammehi sucaritam idam dukkhanca ariyasaccam padatthanam maggassa.
pe8:57.4: Ya saddha taya bhagavantam anussarati mattenapi hatthina samagata, assa bho kukkura sabbam silena nappatipajjati kayena va vacaya va thanam visarado bhavatiti avippatisari panna yassa pannattam upatthapeti.
pe8:57.5: Tassa akhandassa silam yam na pacchi tassam mohassa akusalacittam uppajjati micchaditthisahagatam va, ayam vicayo haro.
pe8:57.6: Dhammavadino bhaddikarati bhavissati atthi esa yutti.
pe8:58.2: Yamidam cittam digharattam paribhavitam saddhaya silena cagena pannaya samadhina pathamajjhanassa padatthanam.
pe8:58.3: Ya saddha assa anavilasankappo, tam dutiyajjhanassa padatthanam.
pe8:58.4: Tini ca aveccappasada yam silam, tam ariyakantam, tam silakkhandhassa padatthanam.
pe8:58.6: Ime ca dhamma idanca cittam ekodibhutasamadhissa padatthanam.
pe8:58.10: Saddha ca panna ca vipassanaya padatthanam.
pe8:58.12: Saddha ca panna ca avijja viragaya pannavimuttiya padatthanam.
pe8:58.13: Silanca cago ca ragaviragaya cetovimuttiya padatthanam.
pe8:59.2: Vinnane vutte saddhasatibhavite sabbe pancakkhandha vutta bhavanti.
pe8:59.3: Saddhaya bhanitaya sabbani satta dhanani bhanitani honti saddhadhanam …pe…
pe8:59.4: silakkhandhe vutte samadhikkhandho ca pannakkhandho ca vutta bhavanti.
pe8:59.5: Yam tam cittam digharattam paribhavitam pacchimake kale na tadanuparivatti bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe8:59.7: Yepi tajjatika dhamma, tepi tadanuparivattino bhavanti.
pe8:59.8: Rupasanna rupasancetananupassanamanasikaro evam channam ayatananam vinnanakaye, ayam lakkhano haro.
pe8:60.3: Ye bhaddikam bhatim akankheyya bhaddikanca abhisamparayam, te saddham silam cagam pannanca manasi karissanti, ayam adhippayo.
pe8:60.4: Ye cannepi satta tathagatassa sammukham na patiyujjhante, imam dhammam sota avippatisarato kalam karissantiti, ayam adhippayo.
pe8:61.2: Idampi cattaro dhamma saddha ca panna ca assaddhiyanca avijjanca hananti.
pe8:61.3: Silanca cago ca tanha ca dosanca hananti.
pe8:61.6: Dve ariyasaccani samatho ca vipassana ca.
pe8:61.8: Imani dve saccani nirodho ca maggo ca.
pe8:62.3: sace puthujjanassa tassapi bhaddika bhati bhavissatiti na ekamsena tassa kammam dittheyeva dhamme vipakanti paccessati, aparamhi va pariyaye bhavissati.
pe8:62.4: Yam va atitam vipakaya paccupatthitam, tappaccayani cetani, ye yatha mahakammavibhange “tenayam vibhajjabyakaraniyo niddeso dhammacarino ya bhaddika bhati”ti.
pe8:63.2: Assaddhiyam dussilyam yam maccheram duppannam ca yanca patipakkhena pahina bhavanti, ayam parivattana.
pe8:64.2: Yam tam cittam digharattam paribhavitam cittam manovinnanam …pe…
pe8:64.3: yam saddhabalam saddhindriyam, yam silam tam sucaritam, samyamo niyamo damo khandhata imani tassa vevacanani.
pe8:64.4: Yo cago so patinissaggo alobho vosaggo cagoyitthanam.
pe8:64.5: Ya panna sa pannatta pannappabha pannindriyam pannabalam.
pe8:65.2: Yam tam cittam bijam pannattiya pannattam.
pe8:65.8: Ime tayo dhamma saddha silam cago pannavato parisuddhim gacchanti.
pe8:66.2: Yam cittam, tam khandhesu vinnanakkhandho, dhatusu manovinnanadhatu, ayatanesu manayatanam.
pe8:66.3: Ye cattaro dhamma, te khandhesu sankharakkhandhe pariyapanna …pe…
pe8:67.2: Idam bhagavato bhasitam mahanamena sakkena pucchitena sabbam tam niyuttam.
pe8:68.2: Idam cittam vemattataya pannattam akusalehi cittehi aparibhavitehi paribhavitanti yani puna paribhavitani annesampi tattha upadaya pannattam sabbepime cattaro dhamma ekattataya pannatta.
pe8:68.3: Bhaddika bhatiti kamabhogino teva rupadhatu arupadhatu manussati sabba bhaddika bhati tadeva kathaya pannattam, ayam pannatti.
pe8:69.10: Panna parato ca ghoso ajjhattanca yoniso manasikaro hetupaccayo ca.
pe8:70.2: Yam tam cittam digharattam paribhavitanti cetasikapi.
pe8:70.3: Ettha sabbe dhamma paribhavita bhaddika te bhati bhavissati, bhaddika upapattiko abhisamparayo.
pe8:70.4: Iti ye keci manussaka upabhogaparibhoga sabbe bhaddika bhatiyeva, ayam samaropano.
pe8:71.3: Yam ito uddham bhavissati anagami, idam uddham.
pe8:71.4: Adho nama yamatikkantamatitam, idamavoca apadanatanti uddham.
pe8:71.5: Tattha atitena sassataditthi pubbantakappikanam aparantaditthi kesanci, ucchedaditthim yam vuttakappikanam ima ceva ditthiyo ucchedaditthi ca sassataditthi ca.
pe8:71.6: Tatthayam sassataditthi imani pannarasa padani sakkayaditthi sassatam bhajanti.
pe8:71.7: Rupavantam me atta, attani me rupam, rupam me attati yaduccate pannam paridahanti.
pe8:71.8: Ya ucchedaditthi sa pancasatani ucchedam bhajanti.
pe8:71.9: Te “tam jivam tam sariran”ti passanti, rupam me attati tatharupa catubbidha sakkayaditthi ucchedena ca sassatena ca.
pe8:71.10: Evam pancasu khandhesu visativatthukaya ditthiya pannarasa padani pubbantam bhajanti.
pe8:71.11: Sassataditthiya panca padani aparantam bhajanti ucchedaditthiya.
pe8:71.12: Tattha “ayamahamasmi”ti passanta rupam attato samanupassati, so ucchedavadi rupavantanca attanam, attani ca rupam, rupasmim va attati so passati cati iti ucchedaditthi ca, attato patissarati sassataditthi pubbantato ca patissarati.
pe8:71.15: Yo tisu addhasu pubbante ca aparante ca tena tena nidditthanena uddham adho sabbadhi vitarago “ahamasmi”ti na anupassatiti imina dvarena imina payogena imina upayena idam dassanabhumi ca sotapattiphalanca so ariyo payogo anabhavangatena samsarena apunabbhavati yo koci ariyo payogo punabbhavaya muduni va pancindriyani majjhani adhimattani va sabbam apunabbhavappahanaya samvattanti.
pe8:71.16: Ahanti ditthogho kamogho bhavogho avijjogho ca odhiso.
pe8:71.17: Tattha desanaharena cattari saccani pancahi indriyehi sotapattiphalena ca dve saccani maggo ca nirodho ca.
pe8:71.18: Sakkayasamudayena dve saccani dukkhanca samudayo ca, ayam desana haro.
pe8:73.2: Tividha puggala koci ugghatitannu koci vipancitannu koci neyyo.
pe8:73.3: Ugghatitannu tikkhindriyo ca tato vipancitannu mudindriyo tato mudindriyehi neyyo.
pe8:73.4: Tattha ugghatitannu tikkhindriyataya dassanabhumimagamma sotapattiphalam papunati, ekabijako bhavati.
pe8:73.6: Vipancitannu muduhi indriyehi dassanabhumimagamma sotapattiphalam papunati, kolankolo ca hoti.
pe8:73.8: Tattha neyyo dassanabhumimagamma sotapattiphalam papunati, sattakkhattuparamo ca bhavati.
pe8:74.1: Atthi esa yutti mudumajjhadhimattehi indriyehi mudumajjhadhimattam bhumim sacchikareyya sakkayaditthippahanena va ditthigatani pajahati.
pe8:75.8: Dvisu ditthisu pahinasu tattha eka ditthi ditthigatani pahanam gacchanti.
pe8:75.9: Uddham ca adho ca vitarago sabbarajaniyesu vitarago hoti.
pe8:75.10: Tajja parabhumiyam, idam paccayanti yathabhutam passati.
pe8:76.3: Ye satta ye nabhiramissanti, te ditthippahanaya vayamissanti.
pe8:77.2: Yanimani muduni pancindriyani tani orambhagiyani pancindriyani.
pe8:77.3: Sabbena sabbam samuhananti abhijjhabyapado ca bhavanakarena sekkhaya vimuttiya balam saddha, uddhambhagiyani ditthivasena balam saddha, viriyindriyam arabhitatta satindriyam paggahitatta accantam nittham gacchanti.
pe8:77.4: Tattha yani indriyani, ayam maggo sankilesappahanam.
pe8:77.5: Ayam nirodho ayatim anuppadadhammo, idam dukkham.
pe8:78.2: “Ayamahamasmi”ti yo samanupassati, so ca kho adhimattena lokika yam bhumiyam na tu ariyena payogena so sakkayaditthi pajahati.
pe8:78.4: Tattha tajjaya bhumiyam pancahi akarehi adhimattatam patilabhati silena vatena bahusaccena samadhina nekkhammasukhena.
pe8:78.6: Etasmimyeva vatthuppattiyam bhagava idam suttam bhasati.
pe8:78.8: Tattha yo appatte pattasanni tassa yo samadhi, so samiso kapurisasevito pana so kapurisa vuccanti puthujjana.
pe8:78.9: Amisam yanca ariyamaggamagamma lokika anariyam tena samadhi hoti anariyo kapurisasevito.
pe8:78.10: Yo pana ariyakarena yathabhutam na janati na passati, so adhigamanam pajahati yo ariyena samadhina akapurisasevitena niramisena niyati, tattha akapurisa vuccanti ariyapuggala.
pe8:78.11: Yo tehi sevito samadhi, so akapurisasevito.
pe8:78.12: Tasma ekam vibhajjabyakaraniyam “ayamahamasmi”ti asamanupassanto tatha pateti.
pe8:79.2: Imaya dassanabhumiya kilesa pahatabba, tehi pahiyanti anidditthapi bhagavata niddisitabba yo.
pe8:80.5: Te appahiyanti anidditthapi bhagavata sassataditthi ca ucchedaditthi ca, sa pariyantaditthi ca.
pe8:80.6: Ya apariyantaditthi ca, sa sassataditthi ca.
pe8:82.2: Yanhi arabbha bhagavata idam suttam bhasitam, so arabbha niddittho.
pe8:82.5: Tena avijja ca sankhara ca paccayo.
pe8:82.6: Nivattinayo na aparo pariyayo sabbabhavo, ye ca sabbabhavassa hetu parabhandapaccayo iti sammaditthi parato ca ghoso yoniso ca manasikaro paccayo.
pe8:82.7: Ya panna uppadeti, esa hetu sammaditthiya sammasankappo bhavati, ya sammasamadhi, ayam parikkharo.
pe8:84.2: Yayam na pacchanutapita ayam avippatisaro, ayam purisattho.
pe8:84.3: Yatha koci bruhayati imatthamasevati so bhaneyya, kinci mamettha adhinam tassatthaya idam kiriyam arabhamiti.
pe8:85.2: Silani kayikam va vacasikam va sucaritam avippatisaroti.
pe8:85.5: Evam yava vimuttiti ekamekasmim pade dve attha—
pe8:85.6: purisattho ca vacanattho ca, yatha imamhi sutte evam sabbesu suttesu dve dve attha.
pe8:85.8: Yam nibbanasacchikam nissaya yam sakam sacchikatabbam bhavati, so vuccati katassa katthoti.
pe8:85.13: Yam yam bhagava dhammam deseti, tassa tassa dhammassa ya atthavinnatti.
pe8:85.14: Ayam attho, tattha silanam avippatisaro atthopi anisamsopi.
pe8:85.15: Eso ca anisamso yam duggatim na gacchati.
pe8:85.16: Yatha tam bhagavata esanisamso dhamme sucinne na duggatim gacchati dhammacari, ayam attho.
pe8:86.1: Yam puriso bhavanabhumiyam silani arabbha silena samyutto hoti evam yava vimutti tatha silakkhandho.
pe8:86.2: Tattha yo ca avippatisaro anusayavasena niddittho, tanca silam ayam silakkhandho.
pe8:86.4: Yam samahito yathabhutam pajanati, ayam pannakkhandho.
pe8:86.5: Ime tayo khandha silam samadhi panna ca tatha silam paripureti yam viriyindriyam tena karanena so silam paripureti, anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppadaya vayamati, uppannassa ca pahanaya anuppannassa ca kusalassa uppadaya, uppannassa ca kusalassa bhiyyobhavaya iti viriyindriyam niddittham.
pe8:86.7: Pannakkhandho pannindriyam, tam catusu sammappadhanesu datthabbam.
pe8:86.8: Tatha yo anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppadaya vayamati, idam pathamam sammappadhanam.
pe8:86.11: Tatha silakkhandhena nekkhammadhatu ca adhika, tayo ca vitakka nekkhammavitakko abyapadavitakko avihimsavitakko ca.
pe8:86.13: Ya piyayamanassa pamojjena idam kayikam sukham anitam aniyamitipemena, idam dukkham.
pe8:86.16: Ya cetasika passaddhi savitakkam savicaram virodhanam, yo kileso ca paridaho, so pathame jhane niruddho.
pe8:86.17: Tatha ya ca kilesapassaddhi ya ca vitakkavicaranam passaddhi, ubhayepi ete dhamme passaddhayam.
pe8:86.18: Tattha kayassa cittassa ca sukham sukhayana, idam pitisukhino passaddhi.
pe8:86.19: Yopi ekodibhavo cittassa, tena ekodibhavena yam cittassa ajjhattam sampasadanam, idam catuttham jhanangam.
pe8:86.20: Iti ajjhattanca sampasado cetaso ca ekodibhavo piti ca sukhanca, idam dutiyam jhanam caturangikam.
pe8:86.21: Yo passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, tena adhimattena sukhena pharitva sukham cetasikam yam, so pitivitarago evam tassa pitivitaragataya upekkham patilabhati.
pe8:86.22: So pitiya ca viraga upekkham patilabhati.
pe8:86.25: Sace sati ekaggata idam pancangikam tatiyam jhanam.
pe8:86.26: Yam sukhino cittam samadhiyati, ayam ekaggataya paravidhanabhagiya, pathame jhane atthi cittekaggata no cakkhussa vedana sabbam paripurim gacchati.
pe8:86.27: Yatha catutthe jhane, tatha ya upekkha passambhayam satisampajannam cittekaggata ca, idam catuttham jhanam.
pe8:87.1: Yatha samadhi dassayitabbam, tatha pannindriyam tam catusu ariyasaccesu passitabbam.
pe8:87.2: Yam samahito yathabhutam pajanati, sa pajanana catubbidha asubhato dukkhato anattato ca, yadarammanam tam dukkham ariyasaccam, yam pajananto nibbindati vimuccati tatha yam kamasavassa pahanam bhavasavassa ditthasavassa avijjasavassa, ayam nirodho appahinabhumiyam asavasamudayo.
pe8:87.3: Imani cattari ariyasaccani yatha pannindriyam passitabbam.
pe8:87.4: Yathayam samahito yathabhutam pajanati, ayam dassanabhumi.
pe8:87.5: Sotapattiphalanca yathabhutam pajananto nibbindatiti, idam tanukanca.
pe8:87.6: Kamaragabyapadam sakadagamiphalanca yam nibbindati virajjati, ayam pathamajjhanabhavanabhumi ca ragaviraga cetovimutti anagamiphalanca.
pe8:87.7: Yam vimutti vimuccati, ayam avijjaviraga pannavimutti arahattanca.
pe8:87.8: Ime avippatisara ca viriyindriyanca cattaro sammappadhana avippatisara tanca upari yava samadhi, evam te cattari jhanani samadhindriyanca yam samahito yathabhutam pajanati.
pe8:87.9: Ime cattaro satipatthana silaparipurimupadaya cagasamhitena ca nibbedhikananca nimittanam anavilamana, idam satindriyam cattaro satipatthana.
pe8:87.10: Yam puna imaya dhammadesanaya tisu thanesu ditthogamanakindriyam kilesapahanena ca sekkhasilam, idam saddhindriyam.
pe8:87.13: Yam jhanam patilabhanam viriyagahitamyeva nanam patissarato, ayam sutamayi panna.
pe8:87.14: Yo samadhi pubbaparanimittabhaso anomagatitaya yathakamo, ayam cintamayi panna, yam tathasamahito yathabhutam pajanati, ayam bhavanamayi panna.
pe8:88.2: Yehi angehi samannagatam tam bujjhissanti tassa angani bujjhissanti, tena bojjhanga.
pe8:88.3: Tatha adito yava silam vatam cetana karaniya, kissa silani paripureti.
pe8:88.4: Anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppadaya uppannassa ca akusalassa pahanaya anuppannassa kusalassa uppadaya uppannassa ca kusalassa bhiyyobhavaya, idam viriyam tassa tassa bujjhitassa anganti.
pe8:88.6: Imina viriyena dve dhamma adito avippatisaro pamojjanca ya puna piti avippatisarapaccaya pamojjapaccaya, ayam pitisambojjhango.
pe8:88.9: Tena kayikasukhamanitam yam sukhino cittam samadhiyati, ayam samadhisambojjhango.
pe8:88.10: Yam samahito yathabhutam pajanati, ayam dhammavicayasambojjhango.
pe8:88.11: Ya silamupadaya pancannam bojjhanganam upadayanulomata nimittayana pitibhagiyananca visesabhagiyananca apilapanata sahagata hoti anavamaggo, ayam satisambojjhango.
pe8:88.14: Kosajjabhumiti garahito rahitehi angehi bujjhati yam cakkhusamathapatham, sa upekkhati.
pe8:88.15: Tena sa upekkha tassa bojjhangassa anganti karitva upekkhasambojjhangoti vuccate.
pe8:89.4: Silavato avippatisaro yava vimutti imissaya pucchaya minikimatthassamiti dve padani puccha dve padani visajjanani dvihi padehi dve abhinnam dvihi ceva padehi visajjana kim pucchati nibbadhikam kayabhumim kammassa tatha hi patittha ca asekkhe dhamme uppadeti.
pe8:89.6: Silavato avippatisaro bhavati kim nicchandassa ca virago atthi esa yutti.
pe8:89.14: Viriyindriyam tinnam magganganam padatthanam, sammavacaya sammakammantassa sammaajivassa.
pe8:89.15: Samadhindriyam tinnam magganganam padatthanam, sammasankappassa sammavacaya sammasamadhino.
pe8:89.16: Pannindriyam dvinnam magganganam padatthanam, sammasatiya sammaditthiya ca.
pe8:90.2: Silakkhandhe vutte sabbe tayo khandha vutta bhavanti, silameva hi selopamata yatha selo sabbapaccatthikehi akaraniyo evam tam cittam sabbakilesehi na kampatiti, ayam amoho.
pe8:90.5: Tattha panna amoho kusalamulam, alobho alobhoyeva, adoso adosoyeva.
pe8:90.6: Imehi tihi kusalamulehi sekkhabhumiyam thito asekkhamaggam uppadeti.
pe8:90.7: Sekkhabhumi sampattikammadhamme uppadeti, sa ca sammavimutti, yanca vimuttirasananadassanam ime dasa asekkhanam arahattam dhamma.
pe8:90.8: Tattha atthangikena maggena catubbidha bhavanapi labbhati.
pe8:90.10: Tattha sammakammantena sammaajivena ca kayo bhavito.
pe8:90.14: Imaya catubbidhaya bhavanaya dve dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti cittam pannanca.
pe8:90.15: Cittam bhavanaya samatho, panna bhavanaya vipassana.
pe8:90.16: Tattha panna avijjapahanena cittam upakkilesehi amissikatanti.
pe8:90.18: Evam yassa subhavitam cittam kuto tam dukkhamessatiti.
pe8:90.19: Api ca kho pana tassa ayasmato abyapadadhatu adhimutta, na so petam samapanno tassa sankhapaharam deti, sankhavitakkite sarire dukkham na vediyati, ayam suttattho.
pe8:91.2: Imamhi sutte dasa asekkha arahattadhamma desita appamana ca samma vibhavana.
pe8:91.4: Selopamata ye ye dhamma vedaniyasukhadukkhopagata, te sabbe nirupam vanupassantanam vupagata kayato vedayitaparikkharo appavattito dukkham na vediyati.
pe8:91.5: Tattha katama yutti, yassevam bhavitam cittam kuto tam dukkhamessatiti.
pe8:91.6: Tisu bhavanasu dukkham nakkhamati cittam cittabhavanaya ca.
pe8:91.8: Iti yassevam bhavitam cittanti samadhi phalassa padatthanam.
pe8:92.2: Yassevam bhavitam cittanti cittani bhavitani yatha pathamam nidditthani panna silam kayo cittam, silampi subhavitam kayikacetasikanca thitatta nanupakampatiti vedanapi tatha sannapi sankharapi.
pe8:92.3: Kuto tam dukkhamessatiti sukhampi nanugacchati, adukkhamasukhampi nagatanti.
pe8:93.3: Ye dukkhena adhika bhavissanti, te evarupahi samapattihi virahissanti.
pe8:93.5: Ye ca appasanna, te hi bhavissanti, pasannananca pitipamojjam bhavissati, ayam tattha bhagavato adhippayo.
pe8:94.1: Vibhattiti yassevam bhavitam cittam kuto tam dukkhamessatiti duvidho niddeso—
pe8:94.4: Yato dukkham agacchati patipakkhe vutte sesadhammanam silam hetu ca paccayo ca, te sabbe dhamma vutta honti.
pe8:94.5: Ekabodhipakkhiye dhamme vutte sabbe bodhagamaniya dhamma vutta bhavanti.
pe8:95.3: Ye avippatisarena chandika, te silaparipuri bhavanti pamojjachandika avippatisariparipuri, ayamettha bhagavato adhippayo …pe…
pe8:96.6: Yam nibbedhagamina maggena pahiyati, samudayoyam vutto.
pe8:97.2: Silavato avippatisaroti vibhajjabyakaraniyam, paramasantassa natthi avippatisaro yava dosakatam kayena va vacaya va akusalam arabhati.
pe8:97.3: Kincipissa evam hoti “sukatametam sucaritametam no cassa tena avippatisarena pamojjam jayati yava vimutti, tassa silavato avippatisaro”ti vibhajjabyakaraniyam, ayam vibhattiharo.
pe8:98.2: Imehi sattahi upanisasampattihi ekadasa upanisa vibhattiyam pajahanam pajahanti, ayam parivattana.
pe8:100.2: Silavato avippatisaroti silakkhandhe nekkhammapannattiya pannattam, nisajjapannatti ca evam dasa angani dvihi dvihi angehi pannattani.
pe8:101.2: Idam nibbedhabhagiyasuttam pancasu otinnam yatha yam pathamam niddittham evamindriyadikhandhadhatuayatanesu niddisitabbani.
pe8:102.2: Silavato avippatisaroti na tava suddho arambho avippatisarino pamojjanti na tava suddho arambho yani ekadasa padani desitani yada tada suddho arambho, ayam sodhano.
pe8:103.2: Silavemattataya pannattam evam dasa padani sabbani silakkhandhassa anisamso, te ca patirupadesavaso ca paccayo attasammapanidhananca hetu, samadhikkhandhassa sukham hetu passaddhi paccayo, yena jhanasahajati ca thananti jhananga aparo pariyayo kamesu adinavanupassana samadhino paccayo nekkhamme anisamsadassavita hetu.
pe8:104.3: Yam silam, te cattaro dhamma padhana.
pe8:105.1: Yassa selopamam cittanti gatha, selopamanti upama yatha selo vatena na kampati na unhena na sitena sankampati.
pe8:105.2: Yatha aneka acetana, te unhena milayanti, sitena avasussanti, vatena bhajanti.
pe8:105.3: Na evam selo (…) virattam rajaniyesu dosaniye na dussatiti karanam dosaniye domanassantam, na dutthena va kampati unhena va, so milayati sitena va avasussati, evam cittam ragena nanussati sitena kampatiti.
pe8:105.7: Dosaniye panassanti na dussati, aduttham tam na kosissanti, tena kuppaniye na kuppati, yassevam bhavitam cittam kuto tam dukkhaniddeso ca kuto evarupassa dukkham agamissatiti niddittham.
pe8:106.1: Parivattanati kuto tam dukkhamessatiti yam cetasikam sukham anupadisesa ayam natthi sopadisesa ayam atthi.
pe8:106.2: Puna evamahamsu tam khanam tam muhuttam ubhayameva avedayitam sopadisesam yanca anupadisesam yanca tam khanam tam muhuttam anupadisesam yanca sopadisesam ca avedayitam.
pe8:107.2: Yassevam bhavitam cittam va bhavitam subhavitam anutthitam vatthukatam susamaraddham.
pe8:109.2: Citte nidditthe pancakkhandha niddittha honti, ayam khandhesu otarano, manovinnanadhatuya nidditthaya attharasa dhatuyo niddittha honti, ayam dhatusu otarano.
pe8:109.3: Manayatane nidditthe sabbani ayatanani nidditthani honti.
pe8:110.2: Chalindriyam bhavana ekattayam pannatti chatthitena kayo ekattaya pannatto.
pe8:111.2: Cittassa pubbahetu samuppadaya manasikaro ca tapponata ca yam asamahitabhumiyam ca visesadhammanam abhavitatta cittasatatam gacchati, sace samadhino sukham hetu avippatisaro paccayo, ayam hetu ayam paccayo parikkharo.
pe8:112.3: Kayo silam panna bhavitacittanti anabhiratam anapanatam anekam anutam anapajjasattam ayam samannayatana na tassa sekkhassa sammasamadhi sabbe asekkha dasa arahantadhamma niddittha honti.
pe8:113.1: Yassa nuna, bhante, kayagatasati abhavita, ayam so annataram sabrahmacarim asajja samapajja appatinissajja janapadacarikam pakkameyya, so ayasma imasmim vippatijanati dve pajani patijanati cittabhavanayanca ditthiya pahanam, kayabhavanayanca ditthippahanam, kayabhavanayanca tanhapahanam, yam pathamam upamam karoti.
pe8:113.2: Asucinapi sucinapi pathavi neva attiyati na jigucchati na pitipamojjam patilabhati, evameva hi pathavisamena so cetasa anvayena appakena averena abyapajjena viharamiti.
pe8:113.3: Iti so ayasma kim patijanati, kayabhavanaya sukhindriyapahanam patijanati, cittabhavanaya somanassindriyapahanam patijanati.
pe8:113.5: Na hi vedanakkhandham ya cetasika sukhavedana tattha ayam patilabhapaccaya uppajjati sukham somanassam.
pe8:113.6: Sotam patikkhipati, na hi manosamphassajam vedanam.
pe8:113.7: Tattha catusu mahabhutesu rupakkhandhassa anusayapatighapahanam bhanati.
pe8:113.10: Balena ca ussahena ca sabbam manasi katattanam pahanam medam katalikaya ca purisena ca mandanakajatikena ca, etehi imassa matapitusambhutam paccavekkhanam, so kayena ca kayanupassanaya ca cittena ca cittanupassanaya ca dve dhamme dhareti.
pe8:113.11: Kayakilesavatthum cittena ca cittasannissaye cittena subhavitena sattannam ca samapattinam viharitum patijanati.
pe8:114.1: Gahapatiputtopamataya ca yatha gahapatiputtassa nanaranganam vatthakarandako punno bhaveyya, so yam yadeva vatthayugam pubbanhasamaye akankhati, pubbanhasamaye nibbapeti, evam majjhanhikasamaye, sayanhasamaye, evameva so ayasma cittassa subhavitatta yatharupena viharena akankhati pubbanhasamayam viharitum, tatharupena pubbanhasamayam viharati, majjhanhikasamaye, sayanhasamaye.
pe8:114.2: Tena vesa ayasmata upamaya me asitaya pathavi va anuttara indriyabhavana bhavitacittena.
pe8:114.3: Tena so ayasma idam atthavidham bhavanam patijanati catusu mahabhutesu, kayabhavanam upakacandalam purisametakam bhavatalakasu cittabhavanam, imahi bhavanahi taya bhavanaya ca samatha paripurimantehi.
pe8:115.1: Katham upakacandalam patikulesu dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati?
pe8:115.2: Kayo pakatiya appatikulam kaye uddhumatakasanna sankhittena nava sanna ime patikula dhamma ceso ayasma patikulato ajigucchito kayagatasatiya bhavananuyogamanuyutto viharati, na hi tassa jigucchappahaya cittam patikulati.
pe8:116.2: Kayo sabbalokassa appatikulo tam so ayasma asubhasannaya viharati.
pe8:117.1: Katham patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca appatikulasanni viharatiti api sabboyam lokassa yamidam mundo pattapani kulesu pindaya vicarati, tena ca so ayasma suvannadubbannena appatikulasanni cittena ca kayena nibbidasahagatena appatikulasanni, evam patikulesu appatikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati.
pe8:118.1: Katham patikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati?
pe8:118.2: Patikulesu ca dhammesu subhasannino itthirupe patikulesu ca jigucchino vinilakavipubbake tattha so ayasma patikulasanni viharati.
pe8:119.1: Katham patikulesu dhammesu tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva upekkhako viharati sato ca sampajano ca?
pe8:119.2: Appatikulesu ca dhammesu subhasannino itthirupe patikulesu ca jigucchino vinilakavipubbake tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva “netam mama, nesohamasmi, neso me atta”ti viharati.
pe8:119.3: Evam tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
pe8:120.3: Tattha ca ayasma sariputto appatikulasanni viharati.
pe8:121.2: Patikulasannino sabbasekkha idha ka tedhatuke sabbaloke.
pe8:121.3: Tattha katamo bhumippatto samadhiphale sacchikato appatikulasanni viharati?
pe8:121.5: Na hi tam atthi yassa lokassa pahanaya patikulasanni uppadeyya.
pe8:122.1: Katham patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca dhammesu patikulasanni viharati?
pe8:122.2: Tedhatuke lokasannivase yava kamalokabhumata hi raganam vitaraganam patikulasamata ruparupadhatum appatikulasamata.
pe8:122.3: Tattha ca ayasma sariputto patikulasanni viharati.
pe8:122.4: Evam patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca dhammesu patikulasanni viharati.
pe8:123.1: Katham patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati?
pe8:123.2: Yam kinci parato duruttanam duragatanam vacanapathanam tam vacanam appatikulam yavata vacaso appatirupa tatha janassa appatikulasanna.
pe8:123.3: Tattha ayasma sariputto abhinnaya sacchikato appatikulasanni viharati, evam patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati.
pe8:124.1: Katham patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca dhammesu tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano?
pe8:124.2: Yanca nesam samanupassati ye dhamma duccarita, te dhamma appatikula.
pe8:124.3: Tattha ayasma sariputto iti patisancikkhati ye dhamma duccarita, te dhamma anitthavipaka.
pe8:124.5: So ca sucaritam acayagaminim karitva duccaritam anitthavipakam karitva tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva upekkhako viharati.
pe8:125.1: Atha patikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulesu ca patikulasanni viharati.
pe8:125.3: Tanhavasena hi satta dvihi dhammehi satta, kabalikare ahare rasatanhaya satta, phasse sukhasannaya satta.
pe8:125.4: Tatthayasma sariputto kabalikare ca ahare patikulasanni viharati, phasse ca dukkhasanni viharati.
pe8:125.5: Evam patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca patikulasanni viharati.
pe8:126.1: Katham patikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati?
pe8:126.2: Tanhakkhayam anuttaram nibbanam tatha balaputhujjananam patikulasanna pahatasanna ca.
pe8:126.3: Tatthayasmato sariputtassa appatikulasanna abyapadasanna ca samam pannaya passitva evam patikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati.
pe8:127.1: Katham patikulesu ca appatikulesu ca dhammesu appatikulasanni viharati?
pe8:127.2: Tatiye ca nibbane patikulasannino yasena ca kittini ca appatikulasannino.
pe8:127.3: Tatthayasma sariputto assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam sammapannaya patijananto patikulanca appatikulanca dhammam tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva appatikulasanni viharati.
pe8:128.1: Katham patikulam appatikulanca dhammam tadubhayam abhinivajjayitva upekkhako viharati?
pe8:128.2: Sato ca sampajano ca, yanca samanupassati anunayo appatikulo dhammo patigho ca patikulo dhammo, tatthayasma sariputto anunayassa patighappahinatta upekkhako viharati sato sampajano ca.
pe8:128.3: Yancassa samanupassati ayam pancavidha anuttara indriyabhavana.
pe8:129.3: Tattha vuccate, imamhi sutte ditthadhammasukhaviharo desito, tatha vimuttam cittam paccavekkhana ca adhipannadhammam desitam.
pe8:130.2: Ye kaye kayanupassino viharanti, tesam cittam anunayappatighena na viharati anunayappatighena cabhiramamanassa cittam samaggatam bhavissatiti bhavanaya balametam, ayam vicayo haro.
pe8:131.2: Kayabhavanaya ca cittabhavanaya ca na kinci sabrahmacari atimannissatiti.
pe8:133.2: Yam pathavisamena cetasa viharati attanupassi pathavisamena gihi viharati.
pe8:133.4: Yatha ye ca selopamataya akammayutta evameva pathavisamo ayam hiriyataya.
pe8:134.2: Imamhi byakarane ko tassa ayasmato adhippayo?
pe8:134.3: Ye keci arahanta indriyabhavanam akankhiyanti, te pathavisamatam uppadayissantiti.
pe8:136.2: Yo kayanupassi viharati, so pathavisamacittatam patilabhissatiti na ekamsena.
pe8:136.4: Ye khandakadichinnakadino, na te pathavisamacittatam patilabhanti.
pe8:136.5: Sabba kayagatasati sekkhabhavanaya nibbanam phalam, ayam vibhatti.
pe8:137.2: Ye kayanupassino viharissanti, tesamyeva kayapaccaya uppajjeyya asava vighataparilaha, ayam parivattano haro.
pe8:138.2: Pancakkhandha avitinna bavisatindriyani, tatha yam manindriyam, tam manodhatu manayatananca.
pe8:139.2: Ye ca manasa cattaro bhavetabba, te sabbe bhavita yam tam manena pahine pattabbatam sabbattha etassa ca atthaya arambho, so attho suddho.
pe8:140.2: Ayam samadhi ekattataya pannatto, cha kaya ekattataya pannatta.
pe8:140.8: Sabbepi ete dhamma dhammakayotiyeva sankham gacchanti.
pe8:141.2: Yanca gocarakosallam yanca kallam tam kosallam paccayo.
pe8:142.2: Yatha pathavi sucimpi nikkhipante asucimpi nikkhitte tadiseyeva evam kayo manapikehipi phassehi amanapikehipi phassehi tadisoyeva patighasamphassena va sukhaya vedanaya tadisam yo cittam.
pe8:142.3: Idam suttam vibhattam saopammam ugghatitannussa puggalassa vibhagena.
pe8:143.2: Yato ca kusalehi dhammehi na virodhati, na vaddhati, imam adinavam bhagava deseti, tasma channam vivareyya, vivatam nativassati, tato adinavato vivareyyati tam tihi dhammehi nabhidhamsitati asubhasannaya ragena nabhidhamsiyati.
pe8:143.5: Evancassa yo yo dhammo patipakkho tamhi tamhi dhamme paripurissati.
pe8:143.6: Yo tassa dhammassa akusalo dhammo patipakkho, tena nadhivasiyati.
pe8:144.2: Ye ime dhamma attana na sakkoti vutthanam, te ete dhamma desita.
pe8:144.3: Channamativassatiti tehi vitakkam yena ca sakka puna desitam cittam vibhavetum pariyodapetum vivekaninnassa vivekaponassa vivekapabbharassa vuddhim virulhim vepullatam apajjati kusalesu dhammesu, seyyathapi nama uppalam va kumudam va padumam va udake sukkapakkhe cando yavaratti yavadivaso agacchati, tassa vuddhiyeva patikankhitabba, na parihani, evamvidham tam cittam nabhidhamsiyati.
pe8:144.4: Aparopettha yo akuto asatho amayavi uju puriso yathabhutam attanam avikaroti.
pe8:144.5: Tattha yo chadeti tassa akusala dhamma cittam anudhavanti.
pe8:144.6: Channamativassatiti yo pana hoti asatho akuto amayavi uju puriso yathabhutam attanam avikaroti.
pe8:144.7: Tassa cittam akusalehi dhammehi na viddhamsiyati, ayam suttattho.
pe8:145.2: Idha desita dasa akusalakammapatha adhivassanataya dasa kusalakammapatha anadhivassanataya akusalehi na visujjhati.
pe8:145.3: Yatha vuttam bhagavata “cittasankilesa, bhikkhave, satta sankilissanti”ti.
pe8:146.2: Yassevam cittam adhivasiyati, tassa bujjhitassa yam bhaveyya kuteyya, tam anantariyenapi satthari va gunanukampanataya, ayam vicayo.
pe8:147.3: Vutthitam patitthahati kusalesu dhammesuti atthi esa yutti.
pe8:148.1: Padatthananti channamativassatiti channam asamvaranam padatthanam, vivatam nativassatiti achannam samvarananam.
pe8:148.2: Tasma channam vivareyya vivatam nativassatiti desanaya padatthanam.
pe8:149.1: Lakkhanoti channamativassatiti ye keci vicittena channena ekalakkhana dhamma sabbe te aviddhamsiyanti.
pe8:149.3: Vivatam nativassatiti ye keci tena acchannena ekalakkhana dhamma sabbe te nativassantiti lakkhano haro.
pe8:150.3: Yesam kesanci cittam akusala dhamma adhipatidesita te yathadhammam patikarissantiti ayam tattha bhagavato adhippayo.
pe8:151.1: Avattoti yam channam tam duvidham kampamanam samucchitabbo.
pe8:151.3: Tattha passaddhiyanca mano asave vaddheti, assaddhiyena ca pamadam gacchati, pamadena onamati, unnalabhavam gacchati.
pe8:151.4: Vuttancetam bhagavata “unnalanam pamattanam tesam vaddhanti asava”ti cattari tani upadanani, yani cattari upadanani, te pancupadanakkhandha bhavanti.
pe8:151.6: Tasma channam vivareyyati yena hetuna, te asava vaddhanti.
pe8:151.8: Tattha appamadena assaddhiyam pahiyati uddhaccakukkuccappahanena olarikata tassa dve dhamma na samatho ca bhavana ca paripurim gacchanti.
pe8:151.9: Yo tesam asavanam khayo, ayam nirodho.
pe8:154.2: Api tu appaccaya samaye ca te niddisitabba, ayam vibhattiharo.
pe8:155.2: Channamativassatiti yassa ye dhamma sabbam anavivatam ativassiyati, vivatam nativassati, avagunantam nativassati.
pe8:156.2: Channanti avutam nivutam pihitam patikujjitam sanchannam parodham, vivatam nativassatiti yassa te dhamma pabbajjita vinodam nadhivassita vantikatati, ayam vevacano haro.
pe8:157.2: Channamativassatiti kilesabhagiyapannattam vivatam nativassatiti sadhammakiccam yam patipada pannattiya pannattam, tasma hi channam vivareyyati anusasanapannattiya pannattam, vivatam nativassatiti niddhanapannattiya pannattam, ayam pannatti haro.
pe8:158.2: Channamativassatiti tayo kilesa rago doso moho, te khandhesu sankharakkhandho …pe…
pe8:158.3: te pura yatha niddittham khandhadhatuayatanesu, ayam otarano haro.
pe8:159.2: Yenarambhena idam suttam bhasati so arambho niyutto.
pe8:160.3: Idam hi ativassatiti imassa ca ativassati evanca ativassatiti ayam vemattataya ya sunasadharanehi lakkhanehi pannapiyati, sa ekattapannatti.
pe8:161.2: Yanca tam ativassiyanti, tassa dve hetu dve paccaya akusalapasuteva vacakattabhirati ca.
pe8:161.3: Ime dve ayonisomanasikaro ca kusala dhamma vopasagga ca, ime dve paccaya.
pe8:162.2: Channamativassatiti vemati passatiti channam yam pariggahitum yam adesitum appassutam yam kathankatha vibhutena akusalamulena yam tanhaya ca te vaddhati dosati sannitva te appasakkhayena sankhara.
pe8:162.3: Sankharapaccaya vinnanam yava jaramaranam, ayam samaropano.
pe8:162.4: Yam puna tatha desana, tasseva akusala dhamma vuddhim virulhim vepullatamapajjati tassa sankhara nirodha, ayam samaropano.
pe8:163.3: Yo tamo andhakaro, yatha vuttam bhagavata “yatha andhakare tasmim bhayanake sakampidhatupuriso na passati, evameva annanato tamopanandhakaro papakasakammasavipakam na saddho hoti”.
pe8:163.4: Iti evam lakkhanata annanam tamo avijja moho, yena satta yathabhutam nappajananti, iti vuccati tamoti.
pe8:163.5: So tinnam cakkhunam tamo mamsacakkhuno dibbacakkhuno pannacakkhuno, imesam cakkhunam idha tamo niddisiyati annananti.
pe8:163.7: Atha nissaye yam pubbante annanam aparante annanam pubbantaparante annanam hetumhi annanam paccayamhi annanam tassa annanino samadhibhutassa eso nissando.
pe8:163.8: Yam na janati idam sevitabbam idam na manasikatabbanti.
pe8:163.9: So tena tamena niddisiyati tamopi yatha vuccati.
pe8:163.12: Tamoti so tena tamena asamuhatena asamucchinnena tapparamo bhavati tapparayano, ayam vuccati puggalo tamo tamaparayanoti.
pe8:163.13: Parayanoyeva dhammo manasikatabbo so tamo dahati annacittam upatthapeti.
pe8:164.2: So tena pannavasena iriyati evam tasseva iriyantassa parayano bhavati.
pe8:165.2: Tattha vuccati joti nama yam tassa ce tamassa patipakkhena ye ca dhamme antamaso nanaloko, so sunadhammo puggalo tamo jotiparayano, tattha vuccate, yoyam puggalo tamo jotiparayano, so yadi tatharupam kalyanamittam patilabhati, yo nam akusalato ca nivareti bhavitakusalatava bhavi niyojetiti.
pe8:165.4: Ime dhamma kusala, ime dhamma akusala.
pe8:165.5: Ime dhamma savajja, ime dhamma anavajja.
pe8:165.6: Ime dhamma sevitabba, ime dhamma na sevitabba.
pe8:165.7: Ime dhamma bhajitabba, ime dhamma na bhajitabba.
pe8:165.8: Ime dhamma upasampajja vihatabba, ime dhamma na upasampajja vihatabba.
pe8:165.9: Ime dhamma manasikatabba, ime dhamma na manasikatabbati.
pe8:165.10: Paccate sannaya yatha sannayati satindriyani, so evam pajanati.
pe8:165.11: Ime dhamma kusala, ime dhamma akusala.
pe8:165.12: Ime dhamma savajja, ime dhamma anavajja.
pe8:165.13: Ime dhamma sevitabba, ime dhamma na sevitabba.
pe8:165.14: Ime dhamma bhavetabba, ime dhamma na bhavetabba.
pe8:165.15: Ime dhamma upasampajja vihatabba, ime dhamma na upasampajja vihatabba.
pe8:165.16: Ime dhamma manasikatabba, ime dhamma na manasikatabbati.
pe8:165.17: So te dhamme susuyyati, sotam odahati, annam cittam upatthapeti, te cassa dhamma nijjhanakkhamanti, so sutamayaya pannaya samannagato so tena paccayavasena iriyati evam tasseva iriyanti tapparamo bhavati tapparayano.
pe8:166.2: Joti nama ya tasseva tamassa patipakkhena ye dhamma antamaso nanaloko, so puna dhammo.
pe8:166.4: Pannayato panditoti vuccate, so evam pajanati.
pe8:166.5: Ime dhamma kusala, ime dhamma akusala.
pe8:166.6: Ime dhamma savajja, ime dhamma anavajja.
pe8:166.7: Ime dhamma sevitabba, ime dhamma na sevitabba.
pe8:166.8: Ime dhamma bhavitabba, ime dhamma na bhavitabba.
pe8:166.9: Ime dhamma upasampajja vihatabba, ime dhamma na upasampajja vihatabba.
pe8:166.10: Ime dhamma manasikatabba, ime dhamma na manasikatabba.
pe8:166.11: Idha pana papamittasamsevano papamittavasanugo akusale dhamme abhivaddheti, kusale dhamme pajahati.
pe8:166.12: So tena pamadena paccayasanna amanasikatva assatiasampajannam asevati.
pe8:166.13: Taya yo patipakkho tamo, so pavaddheti.
pe8:166.14: So tamabhibhuto parayano tamaparamo ceva bhavati.
pe8:167.2: Tattha vuccate soyam puggalo kalyanamittassa sannissito bhavati sakka samyogi kusalam gavesi, so kalyanamitte upasankamitva paripucchati, paripanhayati—
pe8:167.7: Kim upasampajja vihatabbam, kim na upasampajja vihatabbam?
pe8:167.9: Katham sankileso hoti, katham vodanam hoti?
pe8:167.10: Katham pavatti hoti, katham nivatti hoti?
pe8:167.11: Katham bandho hoti, katham mokkho hoti?
pe8:167.12: Katham sakkayasamudayo hoti, katham sakkayanirodho hoti?
pe8:167.13: So ettha desitam yatha upatthitam tatha sampatipajjanto so evam pajanati.
pe8:167.14: Ime dhamma kusala, ime dhamma akusala.
pe8:167.16: yava katham sakkayasamudayo hoti, katham sakkayanirodho hotiti vittharena katabbam.
pe8:167.17: So te dhamme adhipatikankhati evam lakkhanam nanam vijja alokam vaddheti.
pe8:167.18: So puggalo tapparamo bhavati tapparayano, ayam vuccate puggalo joti jotiparayano.
pe8:168.3: Tam bhavanaya hinasu gatisu upapattim dasseti, tapparamo bhavati tapparayano.
pe8:169.2: So tamena akusalassa kammassa vipakam dasseti.
pe8:169.3: Tameti yam cakkhu kalyanamittassa yena akusale dhamme pajahati, kusale dhamme abhivaddhati.
pe8:170.1: Tattha yo ca panitasu gatisu upapattim dasseti, tapparamo tena vuccate tamo jotiparayano.
pe8:171.3: Yam cakkhu papamittasamsaggena papamittupasevena papamittavasanugo akusalam dhammam abhivaddhati, tam bhavanaya hinasu gatisu upapattim dasseti.
pe8:172.1: Tattha yo puggalo joti jotiparayano so jotita pabhata yava panitasu gatisu upapattim dasseti.
pe8:173.1: Jotitamaparayanena dasa akusalanam kammanam udayam dasseti.
pe8:173.2: Tamena puggalena akusalanam kammanam vipakam dasseti.
pe8:174.3: Tattha vuccate imamhi sutte kusalakusala dhamma desita.
pe8:175.3: Tattha thito akusale dhamme uppadiyati vicayantam yujjati.
pe8:175.5: Tattha thito kusale dhamme uppadiyati vicayantam yujjati.
pe8:176.2: Yo puggalo joti, so paccavekkhanaya padatthanam.
pe8:176.3: Yo puggalo tamo, so tamadinnam vanupassanaya padatthananti dasseti.
pe8:176.4: Tamena jotiparayanena appamadassa padatthanam dasseti, tamo avijjaya ca ditthiya ca padatthanam dasseti.
pe8:176.5: Jotina tamaparayanena pamadassa ca ditthiya ca padatthanam dasseti.
pe8:177.2: Tamena tamaparayanena tamoti avijjaya nidditthaya sabbakilesadhamma niddittha honti.
pe8:177.3: Tamena jotiparayanena jotivijjaya nidditthaya sabbe bodhipakkhiyadhamma niddittha honti.
pe8:178.3: Ye satta nicakulino, na te imam sutva kusale dhamme samadaya vattissanti.
pe8:178.4: Ye satta uccakulino, te imam dhammadesanam sutva bhiyyoso mattaya kusale dhamme samadaya vattissantiti.
pe8:179.2: Ya avijjato pabhuti tanha, ayam samudayo.
pe8:179.4: Imani dve saccani dukkhanca samudayo ca joti yena suttena dhammena pannapiyati, so dhammo pannindriyassa padatthanam.
pe8:179.5: Tena amohena tini kusalamulani paripurim gacchanti saggassa padatthanam.
pe8:180.4: Atthi tamo ca bhavo aparapariyavedaniyena ca kusalena jotina puggalena sahopattibhave.
pe8:180.5: Atthi joti ca bhavo aparapariyavedaniyena ca akusalena tamena puggalena sahopattibhave parivattana tamesu patipakkhoti jotina tamaparayano.
pe8:181.2: Yo tamo, so evam attabyapadaya patipanno, so assaddhaya balo akusalo abyatto anadinavadassi.
pe8:181.3: Yo joti, so attahitaya patipanno pandito kusalo byatto adinavadassi.
pe8:182.2: So puggalo vipakapannattiya pannapiyati, akusale pariyadinnata pannapiyati.
pe8:183.1: Otaranoti ye avijjapaccaya sankhara yanca jaramaranam ya ca avijja, tam padatthanam, niddesena vijjuppado avijjanirodho yo yava jaramarananirodho, ime dve dhamma sankharakkhandhapariyapanna.
pe8:185.1: Adhitthanoti tamoti bhagava braviti, na ekam puggalam deseti.
pe8:185.2: Yavata sattanam gati, tattha ye duccaritadhammena upapanna, te bahuladhivacanena tamo niddisati.
pe8:185.3: Ya joti sabbasattesu kusaladhammopapatti sabbam tam jotiti abhilapati ayamekata paccayo yonisomanasikarapannatti catunnam mahabhutanam puggalanam.
pe8:186.2: Akusalassa papamittata paccayo, ayoniso manasikaro hetu.
pe8:186.3: Kusalassa kalyanamittata paccayo, yoniso manasikaro hetu.
pe8:187.2: Idhekacco nice kule paccajato hotiti nice kule paccajato rupesu saddesu gandhesu rasesu phassesu, so upapanno sabbamhi manussake upabhogaparibhoge.
pe8:187.3: Joti panitesu kusalesu upapanno sabbamhi manussake upabhogaparibhoge upapannoti.
pe8:188.1: Tattha katamam sankilesabhagiyam nibbedhabhagiyam ca suttam?
pe8:188.2: Na tam dalham bandhanamahu dhirati gatha.
pe8:188.4: Catuhi karanehi issariyena sakka mocetum dhanena va annena va yacanaya va parayanena va.
pe8:188.5: Yesu ca ayam rago manikundalesu puttesu daresu ca ya apekkha, idamassa cetasikabandhanam.
pe8:188.6: Tam na sakka issariyena va dhanena va annena va yacanaya va parayanena va mocetum.
pe8:188.7: Na ca tattha koci atthi patibhogo.
pe8:188.8: Imina bandhanato mocayitthati devo va manusso va tadidam bandhanam raganusayena ca chasu bahiresu ca ayatanesu bandhati.
pe8:188.9: Rupesu rupatanha bandhati, yava dhammesu dhammatanha.
pe8:188.10: Yo idha loke bandho paralokasmim bandho niyati.
pe8:188.12: Bandho asma loka param lokam gacchati.
pe8:188.13: Na sakka mocetum annatra ariyamaggena imanca bandhanam.
pe8:188.14: Maranabhavanca upapattibhavanca bhayato viditva chandaragam pajahati.
pe8:189.1: Tattha yam bandhanasankharanam pahanam idam vuccati ubhayesu thanesu viriyam, gandhaparivato sumuni nopalimpati.
pe8:189.2: Tatheva pariggahesu puttesu daresu ca avulho salloti tasseva tanhaya pahanam dasseti.
pe8:189.3: Ayam tanhamulassa pahana vare appamattoti kamo pamadavattati pahanaya nekkhammabhirato appamadavihari bhavati.
pe8:189.4: Tassa asayam pahanaya neva imam lokam asisati na paralokam.
pe8:189.5: Na idhalokam nissitam, piyarupam satarupam akankhati.
pe8:189.6: Napi paralokam nissitam piyarupam satarupam akankhati, tena vuccate “nasisate lokamimam param lokanca”ti.
pe8:189.7: Yam tassa pahanam tam chedanam atthakavaggiyesu muni niddittho.
pe8:189.8: So idha virodho atthakavaggiyesu nasisanam idha anatha.
pe8:189.9: Tathayam tanhaya tassa pariggahassa vatthukamassa ekagathaya ete sabbe kama dassita.
pe8:189.10: Tena bhagava deseti “etampi chetvana paribbajanti anapekkhino sabbakame pahaya”ti.
pe8:189.11: Imissa gathaya dvidha niddeso samsandananiddeso ca samayaniddeso ca, yatha ayam gatha sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca, evam taya gathaya sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca visajjana.
pe8:189.12: Evam gatha sabbagathasu byakaranesu va niddittham suttam.
pe8:190.3: Ye ragacarita satta, te kame pajahissantiti ayam tattha bhagavato adhippayo.
pe8:191.2: Yassa dasavatthuka kilesa uttinna vanta vidita.
pe8:191.3: Katame dasavidhati, kilesakama ca orambhagiyauddhambhagiya ca samyojana dasavatthukani ayatanani, ayam vicayo.
pe8:192.2: Ye saratta te galhabandhanena bandhanti atthi esa yutti.
pe8:194.2: Sarattacitto manikundalesu yo ahankare visatto mamankare visatto, yo puttadare saratto.
pe8:195.3: Ye nibbanena chandika bhavissanti, te puttadare tanham pajahissanti.
pe8:196.3: Ye upadinnakkhandha, te ye ca bahiresu rupesu rupapariggaho, idam dukkham, yam tattha chedaniyam, ayam nirodho.
pe8:200.2: Atthi tanha eko satto otinno tappaccaya vinnanam yava jaramaranam.
pe8:200.3: Ya tattha vedana, ayam avijja vijjuppada avijjanirodho yava jaramarananirodho.
pe8:202.2: Na tam dalham bandhanamahu dhirati ekattataya pannatta, na vemattataya.
pe8:202.3: Cattaro raga kamarago ruparago bhavarago ditthirago cati ekattataya pannatta.
pe8:203.2: Yesam rago manikundalesu tassa subhasanna hetu, anubyanjanaso ca nimittaggahita paccayo.
pe8:203.3: Yaya te chinnani tassa asubhasanna hetu, nimittaggahanaanubyanjanaggahanavinodanam paccayo.
pe8:204.2: Saratto manikundalesu sammulhavidho dutthatipi etampi chetvana paribbajantiti tam parinnatattham parivajjitattham pajahita, ayam samaropano.
pe8:205.1: Yam cetasikam yam pakappitam vittharena paccayo, yam va cetasikam kayikam cetasikam kammam.
pe8:205.3: Cetasika hi cetana manokammati vuccate, sa cetanakammam, yam cetasikam imam kayikanca vacasikanca imani tini kammani nidditthani.
pe8:205.4: Kayakammam vacikammanca tani kusalani piyam kayena ca vacaya ca arabhati paramasati, ayam vuccati silabbataparamaso.
pe8:205.5: Sankappana te tividha sankhara punnamaya apunnamaya anenjamaya, tappaccaya vinnanam te arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
pe8:205.8: Yam rupupagam vinnanam titthati ruparammanam rupapatitthitam nandupasecanam vuddhim virulhim vepullatam gacchati, ayam sankappana, iti yam vinnanatthitisu thitam pathamabhinibbattiarammanavasena upadanam, idam vuccati cetasikanti.
pe8:206.1: Tattha thitassa arupassa ya nikanti ajjhosanam, idampi sakampitam manapikesu rupesu piyarupasatarupesu abhogo, idam cetasikam.
pe8:206.2: Yam ceteti sattesu manapikesu abhijjhakayagantho patighanusayesu byapadakayagantho sabbe cattaro gantha, ayam pancasu kamagunesu pathamabhinipato cittassa ya cetana yassa tattha assadanupassissa aneka papaka akusala dhamma cittam arupavatiyo honti.
pe8:206.3: Puggalo raganubandhibhuto tehi kilesakamehi yatha kamakaraniyo, ayam vuccate kamesu pakappana.
pe8:206.5: Yam tehi kamehi samyutto viharati bhavito ajjhosanno, ayam cetana.
pe8:206.6: Yassa tathayam avitaragassa adhigatapemassa tassa viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa dukkhanuparivattitam vinnanam hoti saritassa vayadhammasamuppado cittam pariyadiyati, idam vuccati pakappitanti.
pe8:207.1: Ekamekassa ceteti ca pakappeti ca vinnanassa thiti ya hoti, sa ca thiti dvidha arammanatthiti ca aharatthiti ca.
pe8:207.2: Tattha ya arammanatthiti, ayam namarupassa paccayo.
pe8:207.3: Ya aharatthiti ya punabbhavabhinibbattika thiti ya ca ponobhavika thiti, ayam vuccati arammanam.
pe8:207.4: Tam hoti vinnanassa thitiya tassa vinnanapaccaya namarupam yava jaramarananca ceteti, atha ca puna patthayate yato na ponobhavika anagatavatthumhi, ayam patipakkho niddittho.
pe8:207.5: Na ceteti na patthayati atha ca dusetiti duvidho niddeso.
pe8:207.6: Assa pubbe hoti tam cetasikam tam pakappitam asamuhatam tappaccaya, ayam vinnanassa thiti hoti.
pe8:208.1: Atha va tassa anusaya avibhavanti tappaccaya tassa punabbhavo nibbattati.
pe8:208.2: Atha va nam sankiyate appetu agare va, sukhuma va santi va na sankiyate kame tam evam niccesupi agaresu jato hoti.
pe8:208.3: Tam nayati yam no kappetum evam sankhara cetita pakappita ca arammanabhuta honti, ya ca cetana ya ca pakappana yanca vatthu nibbattam, ubhopi ete arammanam vinnanassa tatha cetanaya ca sankappanaya ca patthanaya ca bhuta satta ceteti ca sankappeti ca.
pe8:208.4: Yam gavesana na ca ceteti na ca sankappeti.
pe8:208.6: Ye ca tanujataandajapi andaka anubhinna samsedaja na ca sambhinna ime bhuta.
pe8:208.7: Katame sambhavesino gabbhagata andagata samsaranto ime na ceteti na pattheti na ca sankappeti.
pe8:208.9: Ye bhuta satta ye sambhavesino, te thavara.
pe8:208.10: Ye va sato cetenti patthenti ca ye thavara.
pe8:208.11: Te na ca cetenti, na ca patthenti, na ca sankappenti, anusayena ca samsaranti.
pe8:209.2: Ye ariyapuggala sekkha, tattha te na ca cetenti, na ca sankappenti, anusayena puna uppajjanti.
pe8:210.2: Sukhuma pana bhumigata udakagata cakkhuno apatham nagacchanti, te na ca cetenti, na ca sankappenti, anusayena ca samsaranti.
pe8:211.2: Bahika sabbe bhikkhu abhimanika, te na ca cetenti, na ca patthayanti, anusayena ca samsaranti, na ca cetenti, na ca sankappenti, na ca anusenti.
pe8:212.3: Na ca cetetiti olarikanam kilesanam pahanam dasseti.
pe8:212.4: Na ca anusetiti sukhumanam kilesanam pahanam dasseti.
pe8:212.5: Na ca cetetiti yena bhumi ca na ca patthayantiti sakadagami anagami, na ca anusetiti araham, na ca cetetiti silakkhandhassa patipakkhena pahanam dasseti, na ca patthayatiti samadhikkhandhassa patipakkhena pahanam dasseti, na ca anusayatiti pannakkhandhassa patipakkhena pahanam dasseti, na ca cetetiti apunnamayanam sankharanam pahanam dasseti, na ca patthayatiti punnamayanam sankharanam pahanam dasseti, na ca anusetiti anenjamayanam sankharanam pahanam dasseti, na ca cetetiti anannatannassamitindriyam, na ca patthayatiti annindriyam, na ca anusayatiti annatavino indriyam.
pe8:212.6: Na ca cetetiti muduka indriyabhavana, na ca patthayatiti majjhaindriyabhavana, na ca anusetiti adhimatta indriyabhavana.
pe8:214.1: Yanca cetayitam yanca pakappitam atthi etam arammanam cittam patitthati vicinati yujjati.
pe8:214.2: Na ca cetetiti na ca patthayatiti atthi evam arammanam anusaye vinnanamiti viciniyati yujjati na ca ceteti na ca patthayati.
pe8:214.3: Anusayappahana vinnanatthitim na gavesanti, viciyantam yujjati.
pe8:216.2: Yam cetasikanti vedayitam pakappitam uggahitam vinnatam tabbinnanam arammanampi paccayopi.
pe8:217.3: Ye punabbhavam na icchanti, te na cetayissanti na ca patthayissantiti, ayam adhippayo.
pe8:218.1: Avattoti ya ca cetana patthana ca anusayo ca vinnanatthitipahana ca, imani dve saccani.
pe8:222.5: Cetana sankappana anusayo samucchedo chandaragavinayapannattiya pannatto.
pe8:222.6: Pathame keci dvihi parivattakehi paticcasamuppado idappaccayataya majjhapannatti.
pe8:223.1: Otaranoti dvihi parivattakehi dukkhanca samudayo ca majjhimakehi maggo ca nirodho ca.
pe8:225.1: Adhitthanoti yancetayitam sabbam adhitthanena ekattaya pannattam.
pe8:226.1: Parikkharoti subhanca arammanam ayoniso manasikaro cetana hetupaccayataya paccayo.
pe8:227.2: Idam suttam sannitam tattha ceteti visajjana iti niddisitabba.
pe8:227.3: Tassa ditthiya vinnanapaccaya namarupam yava jaramaranam, ayam samaropano.
pe8:228.1: Arammanametam na hoti vinnanassa thitiya, vinnananirodha namarupanirodho, namarupanirodha yava jaramarananirodho.
pe8:229.1: Tattha katamam sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca asekkhabhagiyanca suttam?
pe8:229.2: Ayam loko santapajato yava ye hi keci samana va brahmana va bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamahamsu.
pe8:229.3: Sankilesabhagiyam upadhim hi paticca dukkhamidam sambhoti, ya ta pana tanha pahiyanti, bhavam nabhinandatiti nibbedhassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupadaya punabbhavo na hoti.
pe8:230.1: Tattha santapajatoti ragajo santapo dosajo mohajoti.
pe8:230.3: Loko santapajatoti phasso tividho sukhavedaniyo dukkhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhavedaniyo.
pe8:230.4: Tattha sukhavedaniyo phasso ragasantapo, dukkhavedaniyo dosasantapo, adukkhamasukhavedaniyo mohasantapo.
pe8:230.5: Yatha ca bhagava aha pathamakassa valahakassa gomagge yehi gahapatiputta ragajehi dosajehi mohajehi santapehi dukkham supati, te mama santapa na santi.
pe8:231.1: Rogam vadati attatoti tehi santapehi santapito tividham vipallasam patilabhati sannavipallasam cittavipallasam ditthivipallasam.
pe8:232.1: Yatha cittassa vipallaso sannaditthite tividha vitakka—
pe8:232.2: cittavitakko vipallaso sannavitakko vipallaso ditthivitakko vipallasopi.
pe8:232.3: Tattha avijja vipallaso gocara gatipateyyabhumi, yatha hi tam sanjanati yatha vijanati yatha sanjanati ca vijanati ca.
pe8:232.4: Yatha khanti ceteti ime cattaro vipallasa satta yehi catubbidham attabhavavatthum rogabhutam gandabhutam “atta”ti vadanti.
pe8:232.6: Yena yena hi mannati tato tam hoti annathati subhanti mannati na tatha hoti.
pe8:232.7: Evam sukhanti niccam attati so annatha bhavameva santam anagatam bhavam patthayati, tena vuccati “bhavarago”ti.
pe8:232.8: Bhavamevabhinandati, yam abhinandati, tam dukkhanti pancakkhandhe niddisiyati.
pe8:232.9: Yanca tappaccaya sokaparidevadukkham tassa hi bhavessati.
pe8:233.1: Upadhim hi paticca dukkhamidam bhavatiti ye bhavamevabhinandanti yassa bhavessati, tam dukkham tassa dukkhassa pahanamaha.
pe8:233.2: Sabbaso upadananca yam natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti cattaro vipallasa yatha nidditthaupadanamaha.
pe8:233.3: Tassa pathamo vipallaso kamupadanam, dutiyam ditthupadanam, tatiyam silabbatupadanam, catuttham attavadupadanam, tesam yo khayo natthi dukkhassa sambhavo upadhi nidanam dukkhanirodhamaha.
pe8:233.4: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya passato vibhavatanha na hoti.
pe8:233.5: Vibhavam nabhinandatiti dassanabhumim manteti sabbaso tanhakkhayam nibbananti dve vimuttiyo katheti ragaviraganca avijjaviraganca.
pe8:234.2: Yassa yattha parilaheti tassa paridayhantassa so yathabhutam natthi nibbindati ca, ayam vicayo ca yutti ca.
pe8:235.1: Padatthano ragajo parilaho sukhindriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padatthanam.
pe8:235.2: Dosajo parilaho sukhindriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padatthanam.
pe8:235.3: Mohajo parilaho upekkhindriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padatthanam.
pe8:236.2: Phassapareto vedanapareto sannaparetopi sankharaparetopi yena yena mannati yadi subhanimittena yadi sukhanimittena yadi niccanimittena yadi attanimittena asubhe subhanti mannati, evam sabbam ragaje parilahe vutte cattaro parilaha vutta bhavanti.
pe8:236.3: Ragajo dosajo mohajo ditthijo ca ragam vadamiti attato vadati.
pe8:237.3: Ye parilahena na acchanti te bhavam nabhinandanti.
pe8:239.2: Santapajato rogajato rogam vadati attato tam na ekamsena hoti amanasikara santapajato kho na ca rogam attato vadati.
pe8:241.2: Roganca attato vadati sallam attato vadati.
pe8:242.4: Rogam vadati attato vipallaso sankilesapannattiya pannapeti.
pe8:242.5: Yam nabhinandati, tam dukkhanti vipallasanikkhepapannattiya pannatta.
pe8:242.6: Te akatasatta loka majjhena vemattataya pannatta.
pe8:243.2: Santapajatoti tini akusalamulani, te sankhara sankharakkhandhapariyapanna, dhatusu dhammadhatu, ayatanesu dhammayatanam.
pe8:245.2: Parilahoti ye satta loka ekattapannattiya pannatta, te akatasatta loka majjhena vemattataya pannatta.
pe8:246.2: Santapajatoti ayoniso manasikaro hetu, vipallasanca paccayo.
pe8:246.3: Tattha dvihi dhammehi atta abhinivittha cittanca cetasikanca dhamme ubhayani tassa viparitena paramasato.
pe8:246.4: Aparo pariyayo, cetasikehi dhammehi attasanna anattasanna samugghateti.
pe8:246.6: Aniccasanna cetasikesu dhammesu, na tu attasanna.
pe8:246.7: Idam vuccati cittanti va manoti va vinnananti va idam digharattam abbhuggatam etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me attati.
pe8:247.2: Ayam loko santapajatoti akusalam manteti vinnanam namarupassa paccayo yava jaramarananti, ayam samaropano.
pe8:248.1: Evametam yathabhutam, sammappannaya passati akusalamulanam pahanam.
pe8:248.2: Tattha avijjanirodho avijjanirodha yava jaramarananirodho, ayam samaropano.
pe8:249.2: anusotagami patisotagami thitatto, tinno parangato thale titthati brahmanoti.
pe8:250.1: Tattha yo anusotagami ayam kame sevati.
pe8:250.2: Papanca kammam karoti yava kame patisevati.
pe8:250.3: Idam lobho akusalamulam, soyeva tanha, so tehi kamehi vuyhati anusotagamiti vuccati.
pe8:250.4: Yo puggalo tahi gamito tappaccaya tassa hetu akusalakammam karoti kayena ca vacaya ca, ayam vuccati papakammam karotiti.
pe8:250.5: Tassa tini sotani sakkayaditthi vicikiccha silabbataparamaso.
pe8:250.6: Imehi tihi sotehi tividhadhatuyam uppajjati kamadhatuyam rupadhatuyam arupadhatuyam.
pe8:250.7: Tena patipakkhena yo kame na patisevati.
pe8:250.9: Yo sakkayaditthinam pahanaya kamesu yathabhutam adinavam passati.
pe8:250.11: Yanca tappaccaya titthati brahmanoti araham kira.
pe8:250.12: Tattha araham tassa parangato hoti, parangatassa thale titthati sopadisesa nibbanadhatu.
pe8:250.14: Patisotagaminiti phale ditthekatthananca kilesanam pahanamaha, thitattena pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanamaha.
pe8:250.17: Parangatena savaka asekkha ca sammasambuddha ca vutta.
pe8:250.20: Parangatena dasa asekkha arahanta dhamma vutta.
pe8:251.2: Imasmim hi sutte cattari ariyasaccani desitani.
pe8:252.2: Yo kame patisevati papam kareyyati yo ca kame na patisevati so papakammam na kareyyati yo ca imehi dvihi bhumihi uttinno parangatoti ya vimamsa ayam vicayo.
pe8:253.1: Yuttiti yujjati suttesu, nayujjatiti ya vimamsaya, ayam yutti.
pe8:255.5: Tanhaya sabbesampi so kilesanam vayamati patisotam.
pe8:255.6: Yo attana thito kayenapi so thito vacacittenapi so thito.
pe8:256.3: Ye anusotagaminiya patipadaya nabhiramissanti, te patisotam vayamissantiti yava kadaci bhumiyam, ayam adhippayo.
