pe8:257.1: Avattoti idha sutte cattari suttani desitani.
pe8:258.2: Yo kame patisevati papanca kammam karoti.
pe8:258.3: So anusotagamiti na ekamsena sotapannopi kame patisevati.
pe8:258.5: Kincapi sekkhopi kareyya papam yatha sutte niddittho na ca so anusotagami, idam vibhajjabyakaraniyam.
pe8:258.6: Na ca kame patisevati na ca papakammam karoti patisotagami na ca ekamsena sabbe bahirako kamesu vitarago na ca kame patisevati, tena ca papakammam karoti anusotagami patisotagami, ayam vibhatti.
pe8:261.3: Ye pana sekkha puggala, te nibbanapannattiya pannatta.
pe8:261.4: Ye pana anagami, te asamhariya pannattiya pannatta, ayam pannatti.
pe8:262.2: Ye tassa dhamma, te dukkhassa samudayo.
pe8:262.3: Yam rupam, ayam rupakkhandho, evam pancapi khandha paticcasamuppado, te kilesa sankharakkhandhapariyapanna dhammayatanam dhammadhatu indriyesu ca pannatta.
pe8:263.1: Sodhanoti yenarambhena idam suttam desitam, so arambho sabbo suddho.
pe8:264.1: Adhitthanoti patisotagamina sabbe sotapanna ekattena va niddittha raganusayapatisotagamino sekkhava maggo ca sekkho ca puggalo thitattoti.
pe8:265.2: Parangatoti sabbe arahanto sabbe paccekabuddha sammasambuddha ca ekattaya pannatta.
pe8:266.2: Patisotagamino dve hetu dve paccaya ca yava sammaditthiya uppadayaditthi, tassa patiladdhamaggo hetu arambho paccayo kayiko cetasikassa kotthaso ca.
pe8:267.1: Samaropanoti vibhatti idam suttam natthi samaropanaya bhumi.
pe8:268.1: Pancanisamsa sotanugatanam dhammanam yava ditthiya suppatividdhanam suttam vittharena katabbam.
pe8:268.2: Yunjato ghatentassa vayamato gilano maranakale devabhuto paccekabodhim papunati.
pe8:268.4: Na ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya tassa cittam tasitam hoti, na ca anibbiddhattam, idam ca suttam pancannam puggalanam desitam, saddhanusarino mudindriyassa tikkhindriyassa ca dhammanusarino tikkhindriyassa mudindriyassa ca.
pe8:268.5: Yo pana mohacarito puggalo na sakkoti yunjitum ghatitum vayamitum yathabhutam yathasamadhika vimutti tam khanam tam layam tam muhuttam phalam dasseti.
pe8:268.6: Sadhu parihayati paro tam duyhati, no tu sukhaavipakini bhavati.
pe8:268.8: Tattha yo puggalo dhammanusari tassa yadi sotanugata dhamma honti so yunjanto papunati.
pe8:268.9: Yo dhammanusari mudindriyo, so gilano papunati.
pe8:268.10: Yo saddhanusari tikkhindriyo, so maranakalasamaye papunati.
pe8:268.12: Yada devabhuto na papunati, na so teneva dhammaragena taya dhammanandiya paccekabodhim papunati.
pe8:268.13: Yo sotanugatesu yunjati ghateti vayamati, so pubbapannena visesam sanjanati, sanjananto papunati.
pe8:268.14: Sace pana gilanassa manasikaro hoti, tattha yunjanto papunati.
pe8:268.15: Sace panassa maranakale samviggo hoti, tattha yunjanto papunati.
pe8:268.16: Sace pana na katthaci samvego hoti, tassa devabhutassa sukhino dhammabhuta pada evam avilapati.
pe8:268.17: So evam janati “ayam so dhammavinayo yattha mayam pubbe manussabhuta brahmacariyam carimha”ti.
pe8:268.19: Dibbesu va pancasu kamagunesu ajjhosito hoti pamadavihari, so tena kusalamulena paccekabodhim papunati.
pe8:269.1: Ya paratoghosena vacasa suparicita, ayam sutamayi panna.
pe8:269.2: Ye pana dhamma honti manasa anupekkhita, ayam cintamayi panna.
pe8:269.3: Yam ditthiya suppatividdha, ayam bhavanamayi panna.
pe8:269.4: Yam sotanugata vacasa paricita honti, so ca dittheyeva dhamme parinibbayi, ayam araham puggalo.
pe8:269.5: Yo upapajjati devabhuto papunati, tattha ca parinibbayati, ayam anagami.
pe8:269.6: Yo tena kusalamulena paccekabodhim papunati, ayam pubbayogasambharasambhuto puggalo.
pe8:270.1: Sotanugata dhammati pathamam vimuttayatanam, vacasa paricitati dutiyam tatiyanca vimuttayatanam, manasa anupekkhitati catuttham vimuttayatanam ditthiya suppatividdhati pancamam vimuttayatanam.
pe8:271.1: Sotanugataya vimuttiya vacasa ya vaca suppatividdha anupubbadhammassa sotena sutva silakkhandhe paripureti, manasa anupekkhita samadhikkhandham paripureti, ditthiya suppatividdha pannakkhandham paripureti.
pe8:272.1: Sotanugata dhamma bahussuta hontiti vittharena katabbam.
pe8:272.2: Idam pathamam saddhapadanam manasa anupekkhitati patisallanabahulo viharati, vittharena katabbam.
pe8:272.3: Idam dutiyam saddhapadanam ditthiya suppatividdhati anasava cetovimuttiya naparam itthattayati pajanatiti.
pe8:273.3: Ditthiya suppatividdhati tathagatam arahantam sammasambuddham sattha dasseti.
pe8:275.2: Imamhi sutte tayo esana desita sotanugatehi dhammehi vacasa paricitehi kamesanaya samathamaggo.
pe8:276.1: Vicayoti yatha suttam manasikaronto vicinanto sutamayipannam patilabhati.
pe8:276.2: Yatha ca so manasikarotiti yatha sutadhamma tada cintamayipannam patilabhati.
pe8:276.3: Yatha dittheva dhamme manasikaroti tada bhavanamayipannam patilabhati.
pe8:278.4: Ditthiya anupekkhitati pannayapi anupekkhita ditthiyapi anupekkhita.
pe8:279.1: Catubyuhoti imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippayo?
pe8:279.2: Ye imahi dvihi pannahi samannagata tehi ….
pe8:280.1: Sa nibbutoti maggaphalam anupadisesanca nibbanadhatum manteti, danena olarikanam kilesanam pahanam manteti.
pe8:280.2: Silena majjhimanam, pannaya sukhumakilesanam manteti, ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti kata ca bhumi.
pe8:282.1: Kusalo ca jahati papakanti maggo vutto.
pe8:283.1: Dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamatoti tihi padehi lokikam kusalamulam vuttam.
pe8:283.2: Ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti lokuttaram kusalamulam vuttam.
pe8:284.1: Dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamato veram na ciyatiti puthujjanabhumim manteti.
pe8:284.2: Kusalo ca jahati papakanti sekkhabhumim manteti.
pe8:285.1: Dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamato veram na ciyatiti magganiya patipada vutta.
pe8:286.1: Dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamato veram na ciyatiti danakatham silakatham maggakatham lokikanam dhammanam desanamaha.
pe8:286.2: Kusalo ca jahati papakanti loke adinavanupassana.
pe8:286.3: Ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti samukkamsikaya dhammadesanayapi patividdha.
pe8:287.1: Dadato punnam pavaddhatiti pananam abhayadanena panatipata veramanisattanam abhayam deti.
pe8:287.3: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti sile patitthaya cittam samyameti, tassa samyamato paripurim gacchati.
pe8:288.3: Dve sugatiyo deva ca manussa ca, dibba ca pancakamaguna, manussaka ca.
pe8:288.5: Dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamato veram na ciyati, kusalo ca jahati papakanti maggo vutto.
pe8:288.6: Ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti dve nibbanadhatuyo desita sopadisesa ca anupadisesa ca.
pe8:289.1: Vicayoti dadato punnam pavaddhatiti imina pathamena padena danamayikapunnakiriyavatthu vuttam.
pe8:289.3: Dutiyena padena … yanti, niyyanikam sasananti, ayam adhippayo.
pe8:290.1: Assavanena ca amanasikarena ca appativedhena ca sakkayasamudayagamini patipada vutta.
pe8:290.2: Savanena ca manasikarena ca pativedhena ca sakkayanirodhagamini patipada vutta.
pe8:291.3: Parivattanati ye pancanisamsa, te pancadina patipakkhena teneva dittheva dhamme papunati, tam upapajjamana aparo pariyayo.
pe8:292.1: Vevacananti sotanugata dhammati yam suttam ditthampi pannindriyam vinnattampi ditthiya suppatividdhampi vibhavitampi.
pe8:293.2: Manasikaro pamojjapannattiya pannatto, ditthadhammapi anisamsapannattiya pannatta.
pe8:294.1: Otaranoti tisso panna vacasa paricitesu sutamayi panna manasa anupekkhitesu cintamayi panna ditthiya suppatividdhasu bhavanamayi panna.
pe8:294.2: Imani ariyasaccani indriyani vijjuppada avijjanirodho paticcasamuppado indriyesu tini indriyani, ayatanesu dhammayatanapariyapanna dhatusu dhammadhatupariyapannati.
pe8:295.1: Sodhanoti yo arambho suttassa paveso niyutto.
pe8:296.1: Adhitthanoti pancanisamsati vemattataya pannatta anisamsa sota anugatati vemattataya ariyavoharo pannatto, dhamme ca savananti ekattataya pannattam.
pe8:297.1: Parikkharoti dhammassavanassa payirupasana paccayo, saddha hetu.
pe8:297.2: Manasa anupekkhitati atthappatisamvedita paccayo, dhammappatisamvedita hetu, ditthiya suppatividdhati saddhammassavananca manasikaro ca paccayo, sutamayi cintamayi panna hetu.
pe8:298.1: Samaropanoti vibhattam suttam aparo pariyayo nibbatti bale natthi.
pe8:299.4: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti silamayikapunnakiriyavatthu vuttam.
pe8:299.5: Kusalo ca jahati papakanti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byapadassa ca pahanamaha.
pe8:299.6: Ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byapadassa ca chandaragavinayamahati.
pe8:299.7: Dadato punnam pavaddhatiti gatha alobho kusalamulam bhavati.
pe8:299.8: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti adoso kusalamulam bhavati.
pe8:299.9: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti avera asapatta abyapadataya sada.
pe8:299.10: Kusalo ca jahati papakanti nanuppada annananirodho.
pe8:299.11: Catutthapadena ragadosamohakkhayena ragaviraga cetovimuttimohakkhayena avijjaviraga pannavimutti, ayam vicayo.
pe8:300.1: Yuttiti dane thito ubhayam hi paripureti.
pe8:301.1: Padatthananti dadato punnam pavaddhatiti cagadhitthanassa padatthanam.
pe8:301.2: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti pannadhitthanassa padatthanam kusalo ca jahati papakanti saccadhitthanassa padatthanam.
pe8:302.2: Dadato punnam pavaddhati samyamato veram na ciyati.
pe8:302.3: Dadatopi veram na kariyati kusalo ca jahati papakam ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbuto rupakkhayapi vedanakkhayapi, yena rupena dittham, tena tathagato pannapento pannapeyya rupassa khaya viraganirodhati evam pancakkhandha.
pe8:303.3: Te danam dassanti parissayapahanaya, ye averabhichandaka, te panca verani pajahissanti, ye kusalabhichandaka, te atthangikam maggam bhavessanti atthannam micchattanam pahanaya.
pe8:303.4: Ye nibbayitukama, te ragadosamoham pajahissantiti ayam bhagavato adhippayo.
pe8:304.1: Avattoti yanca adadato macchariyam yanca asamyamato veram yanca akusalassa papassa appahanam, ayam dukkhaniddeso na samudayo.
pe8:304.2: Alobhena ca adosena ca amohena ca kusalena imani tini kusalamulani.
pe8:304.3: Tesam paccayo attha sammattani, ayam maggo.
pe8:305.1: Vibhattiti dadato punnam pavaddhatiti na ekamsena yo rajadandabhayena deti, yo ca akappiyassa paribhogena silavantesu deti, na tassa punnam pavaddhatiti so cetam danam akusalena deti, dandadanam satthadanam apunnamayam pavaddhati, na punnam.
pe8:305.2: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti na ekamsena kinkaranam yanca yo padam ditthadhammikam passati yadi mama rajano gahetva hattham va chindeyya …pe…
pe8:305.3: na tena samyamena veram na karoti.
pe8:305.4: Yo tu evam samadiyati panatipatassa papako vipakoti, ditthe yeva dhamme abhisamparaye ca evam sabbassa akusalassa hetuto arati.
pe8:306.1: Parivattanati dadato punnam pavaddhatiti adadato punnam na pavaddhati.
pe8:306.2: Yam danamayam, tam samyamato veram na ciyati, asamyamato veram kariyati.
pe8:306.3: Kusalo ca jahati papakam akusalo na jahati.
pe8:306.4: Ragadosamohakkhaya sanibbutoti dutam pesetva panitam pesetvapi na pakkosami, so sayameva pana mahabhikkhusanghaparivaro amhakam vasanatthanam sampatto amhehi ca santhagarasala karita, ettha mayam dasabalam anetva mangalam bhanapemati cintetva upasankamimsu.
pe8:306.5: Yena santhagaram tenupasankamimsuti tam divasam kira santhagare cittakammam nitthapetva attaka muttamatta honti.
pe8:306.6: Buddha nama arannajjhasaya arannarama antogame vaseyyum va no vati tasma bhagavato manam janitvava patijaggissamati cintetva te bhagavantam upasankamimsu.
pe8:306.7: Idani pana manam labhitva patijaggitukama yena santhagaram, tenupasankamimsu.
pe8:306.8: Sabbasantharinti yatha sabbam santhatam hoti evam yena bhagava tenupasankamimsuti.
pe8:306.9: Ettha pana te mallarajano santhagaram patijaggitva nagaravithiyopi sammajjapetva dhaje ussapetva suvannaghatikadaliyo ca thapapetva sakalanagaram dipamalahi vippakinnatarakam viya katva khirapake darake khiram payetha, dahare kumare lahum lahum bhojapetva sayapetha, uccasaddam makari, ajja ekarattim sattha antogameva vasissati, buddha nama appasaddakama hontiti bherim carapetva sayam dandakadipika adaya yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu.
pe8:306.10: Bhagavantamyeva purakkhatvati bhagavantam purato katva, tattha bhagava bhikkhunanceva upasakananca majjhe nisinno ativiya virocati.
pe8:306.11: Samantapasadiko suvannavanno abhirupo dassaniyo puratthimakayato suvannavanna rasmi utthahitva gaganatale asitihattham thanam ganhati.
pe8:306.12: Pacchimakayato dakkhinahatthato vamahatthato suvannavanna hettha padatalehi pavalavannarasmi utthahitva ghanapathaviyam asitihattham thanam ganhati, evam samanta asitihatthamattam thanam chabbannabuddharasmiyo vijjotamana vitandamana vidhavanti, sabbe disabhaga suvannacampakapupphehi vikiriyamana viya suvannaghatato nikkhantasuvannarasadharahi sincamana viya pasaritasuvannapataparikkhitta viya verambhavatasamutthitakimsukakimsukarakanikarapupphacunnasamokinna viya vippakasantam asitianubyanjanabyamappabha dvattimsavaralakkhanasamujjalam sariram samuggatatarakam viya gaganatalam vikasitamiva padumavanam sabbaphaliphullo viya yojanasatiko paricchattako patipatiya thapitanam dvattimsacandanam dvattimsasuriyanam dvattimsacakkavattinam dvattimsadevarajanam dvattimsamahabrahmanam nibbuto asekkhassa natthi nibbuti.
pe8:307.1: Vevacananti dadato punnam pavaddhati, anumodatopi punnam pavaddhati.
pe8:308.1: Pannattiti dadato punnam pavaddhati, alobhassa patinissayaghatapannattiya pannattam.
pe8:308.2: Samyamato veram na ciyatiti adosassa patinissayaghatapannattiya pannattam kusalo ca jahati papakanti amohassa patinissayaghatapannattiya pannattam.
pe8:309.1: Otaranoti pancasu indriyesu dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamato veram na ciyati samyamena silakkhandho.
pe8:309.2: Otinno chasu indriyesu samvaro, ayam samadhikkhandho, yam kusalo ca jahati papakam, ayam pannakkhandho, ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti vimuttikkhandho.
pe8:310.1: Sodhanoti yenarambhena idam suttam desitam so arambho suddho.
pe8:311.2: Cago pariccago dhammadanam amisadanam, attha danani vittharena katabbani, ayam vemattata.
pe8:312.1: Parikkharoti danassa pamojjam paccayo, alobho hetu.
pe8:312.2: Samyamato yoniso manasikaro hetu, pariccago paccayo.
pe8:312.3: Kusalo ca jahati papakanti yathabhutadassanam paccayo, nanappatilabho hetu.
pe8:312.4: Ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti parato ca ghoso ajjhattanca yoniso manasikaro maggo ca hetu ca paccayo ca.
pe8:313.1: Samaropanoti dadato punnam pavaddhatiti gatha tassa silampi vaddhati.
pe8:313.4: Annepi kilesa na ciyanti yepissa tappaccaya uppajjeyyum asava vighata, tepissa na uppajjanti.
pe8:313.5: Ragadosamohakkhaya sa nibbutoti ragadosassapi khaya raganusayassapi khaya dosassa mohassapi sa nibbutoti sopadisesa nibbanadhatu anupadisesapi.
pe8:313.7: Therassa mahakaccayanassa petakopadese harassa sampatabhumi samatta.
